My Project
solver_adjoint_mean.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 
38 #include "../include/solver_structure.hpp"
39 
40 CAdjEulerSolver::CAdjEulerSolver(void) : CSolver() {
41 
42  /*--- Array initialization ---*/
43  Phi_Inf = NULL;
44  Sens_Mach = NULL;
45  Sens_AoA = NULL;
46  Sens_Geo = NULL;
47  Sens_Press = NULL;
48  Sens_Temp = NULL;
49  Sens_BPress = NULL;
50  iPoint_UndLapl = NULL;
51  jPoint_UndLapl = NULL;
52  Jacobian_Axisymmetric = NULL;
53  CSensitivity = NULL;
54  FlowPrimVar_i = NULL;
55  FlowPrimVar_j = NULL;
56  DonorAdjVar = NULL;
57  DonorGlobalIndex = NULL;
58 
59 }
60 
61 CAdjEulerSolver::CAdjEulerSolver(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) : CSolver() {
62  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
63  string text_line, mesh_filename;
64  unsigned short iDim, iVar, iMarker, nLineLets;
65  ifstream restart_file;
66  string filename, AdjExt;
67  su2double myArea_Monitored, Area, *Normal;
68 
69  bool restart = config->GetRestart();
70 
71  bool axisymmetric = config->GetAxisymmetric();
72 
73  su2double RefArea = config->GetRefArea();
74  su2double RefDensity = config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
75  su2double Gas_Constant = config->GetGas_ConstantND();
76  su2double Mach_Motion = config->GetMach_Motion();
77  su2double RefVel2, Mach2Vel, Weight_ObjFunc, factor;
78  su2double *Velocity_Inf;
79  string Marker_Tag, Monitoring_Tag;
80  unsigned short iMarker_Monitoring, jMarker, ObjFunc;
81  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
82 
83  /*--- Array initialization ---*/
84 
85  Phi_Inf = NULL;
86  Sens_Mach = NULL;
87  Sens_AoA = NULL;
88  Sens_Geo = NULL;
89  Sens_Press = NULL;
90  Sens_Temp = NULL;
91  Sens_BPress = NULL;
92  iPoint_UndLapl = NULL;
93  jPoint_UndLapl = NULL;
94  Jacobian_Axisymmetric = NULL;
95  CSensitivity = NULL;
96  FlowPrimVar_i = NULL;
97  FlowPrimVar_j = NULL;
98  DonorAdjVar = NULL;
99  DonorGlobalIndex = NULL;
100  Normal = NULL;
101 
102  /*--- Set the gamma value ---*/
103  Gamma = config->GetGamma();
104  Gamma_Minus_One = Gamma - 1.0;
105 
106  /*--- Define geometry constans in the solver structure ---*/
107  nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
108  nMarker = config->GetnMarker_All();
109  nPoint = geometry->GetnPoint();
110  nPointDomain = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
111 
112  nVar = nDim + 2;
113 
114  /*--- Initialize nVarGrad for deallocation ---*/
115 
116  nVarGrad = nVar;
117 
118  node = new CVariable*[nPoint];
119 
120  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the residual ---*/
121  Residual = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual[iVar] = 0.0;
122  Residual_RMS = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_RMS[iVar] = 0.0;
123  Residual_Max = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_Max[iVar] = 0.0;
124  Point_Max = new unsigned long[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Point_Max[iVar] = 0;
125  Point_Max_Coord = new su2double*[nVar];
126  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
127  Point_Max_Coord[iVar] = new su2double[nDim];
128  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Point_Max_Coord[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
129  }
130  Residual_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_i[iVar] = 0.0;
131  Residual_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_j[iVar] = 0.0;
132  Res_Conv_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Conv_i[iVar] = 0.0;
133  Res_Visc_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Visc_i[iVar] = 0.0;
134  Res_Conv_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Conv_j[iVar] = 0.0;
135  Res_Visc_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Visc_j[iVar] = 0.0;
136 
137  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the solution ---*/
138  Solution = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution[iVar] = 0.0;
139  Solution_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution_i[iVar] = 0.0;
140  Solution_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution_j[iVar] = 0.0;
141 
142  /*--- Define some auxiliary arrays related to the flow solution ---*/
143  FlowPrimVar_i = new su2double[nDim+7]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim+7; iVar++) FlowPrimVar_i[iVar] = 0.0;
144  FlowPrimVar_j = new su2double[nDim+7]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim+7; iVar++) FlowPrimVar_j[iVar] = 0.0;
145 
146  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the geometry ---*/
147  Vector = new su2double[nDim]; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector[iDim] = 0.0;
148  Vector_i = new su2double[nDim]; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector_i[iDim] = 0.0;
149  Vector_j = new su2double[nDim]; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector_j[iDim] = 0.0;
150 
151  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the undivided lapalacian ---*/
152  if (config->GetKind_ConvNumScheme_AdjFlow() == SPACE_CENTERED) {
153  iPoint_UndLapl = new su2double [nPoint];
154  jPoint_UndLapl = new su2double [nPoint];
155  }
156 
157  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the geometry ---*/
158  Vector_i = new su2double[nDim]; Vector_j = new su2double[nDim];
159 
160  /*--- Point to point Jacobians. These are always defined because
161  they are also used for sensitivity calculations. ---*/
162  Jacobian_i = new su2double* [nVar];
163  Jacobian_j = new su2double* [nVar];
164  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
165  Jacobian_i[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
166  Jacobian_j[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
167  }
168 
169  LinSysSol.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
170  LinSysRes.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
171 
172  /*--- Jacobians and vector structures for implicit computations ---*/
173  if (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT) {
174  Jacobian_ii = new su2double* [nVar];
175  Jacobian_ij = new su2double* [nVar];
176  Jacobian_ji = new su2double* [nVar];
177  Jacobian_jj = new su2double* [nVar];
178  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
179  Jacobian_ii[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
180  Jacobian_ij[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
181  Jacobian_ji[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
182  Jacobian_jj[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
183  }
184 
185  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
186  cout << "Initialize Jacobian structure (Adjoint Euler). MG level: " << iMesh <<"." << endl;
187  Jacobian.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, nVar, true, geometry, config);
188 
189  if ((config->GetKind_Linear_Solver_Prec() == LINELET) ||
190  (config->GetKind_Linear_Solver() == SMOOTHER_LINELET)) {
191  nLineLets = Jacobian.BuildLineletPreconditioner(geometry, config);
192  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Compute linelet structure. " << nLineLets << " elements in each line (average)." << endl;
193  }
194 
195  if (axisymmetric) {
196  Jacobian_Axisymmetric = new su2double* [nVar];
197  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
198  Jacobian_Axisymmetric[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
199  }
200  } else {
201  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
202  cout << "Explicit scheme. No Jacobian structure (Adjoint Euler). MG level: " << iMesh <<"." << endl;
203  }
204 
205  /*--- Computation of gradients by least squares ---*/
206  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) {
207  /*--- S matrix := inv(R)*traspose(inv(R)) ---*/
208  Smatrix = new su2double* [nDim];
209  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
210  Smatrix[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
211  /*--- c vector := transpose(WA)*(Wb) ---*/
212  Cvector = new su2double* [nVar];
213  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
214  Cvector[iVar] = new su2double [nDim];
215  }
216 
217  /*--- Sensitivity definition and coefficient in all the markers ---*/
218  CSensitivity = new su2double* [nMarker];
219  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
220  CSensitivity[iMarker] = new su2double [geometry->nVertex[iMarker]];
221  }
222 
223  /*--- Store the value of the characteristic primitive variables at the boundaries ---*/
224 
225  DonorAdjVar = new su2double** [nMarker];
226  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
227  DonorAdjVar[iMarker] = new su2double* [geometry->nVertex[iMarker]];
228  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
229  DonorAdjVar[iMarker][iVertex] = new su2double [nVar];
230  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
231  DonorAdjVar[iMarker][iVertex][iVar] = 0.0;
232  }
233  }
234  }
235 
236  /*--- Store the value of the characteristic primitive variables index at the boundaries ---*/
237 
238  DonorGlobalIndex = new unsigned long* [nMarker];
239  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
240  DonorGlobalIndex[iMarker] = new unsigned long [geometry->nVertex[iMarker]];
241  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
242  DonorGlobalIndex[iMarker][iVertex] = 0;
243  }
244  }
245 
246  Sens_Geo = new su2double[nMarker];
247  Sens_Mach = new su2double[nMarker];
248  Sens_AoA = new su2double[nMarker];
249  Sens_Press = new su2double[nMarker];
250  Sens_Temp = new su2double[nMarker];
251  Sens_BPress = new su2double[nMarker];
252 
253  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
254  Sens_Geo[iMarker] = 0.0;
255  Sens_Mach[iMarker] = 0.0;
256  Sens_AoA[iMarker] = 0.0;
257  Sens_Press[iMarker] = 0.0;
258  Sens_Temp[iMarker] = 0.0;
259  Sens_BPress[iMarker] = 0.0;
260  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++)
261  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = 0.0;
262  }
263 
264  /*--- Adjoint flow at the inifinity, initialization stuff ---*/
265  PsiRho_Inf = 0.0; PsiE_Inf = 0.0;
266  Phi_Inf = new su2double [nDim];
267  Phi_Inf[0] = 0.0; Phi_Inf[1] = 0.0;
268  if (nDim == 3) Phi_Inf[2] = 0.0;
269 
270  /*--- If outflow objective, nonzero initialization ---*/
271  if ((config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == SURFACE_TOTAL_PRESSURE)) {
272  su2double SoundSpeed,*vel_inf,R,vel2,vel;
273  R = config->GetGas_ConstantND();
274  vel_inf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
275  vel2=0;
276  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++)
277  vel2 +=vel_inf[iDim]*vel_inf[iDim];
278  vel = pow(vel2,0.5);
279  SoundSpeed= pow(Gamma*config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND()*R, 0.5);
280  PsiE_Inf = Gamma_Minus_One*vel2/(vel2-pow(SoundSpeed,2.0))*0.5/vel;
281  PsiRho_Inf += PsiE_Inf*(2*SoundSpeed*SoundSpeed+vel2*Gamma_Minus_One)/(2.0*Gamma_Minus_One);
282  // Assumes +x flow direction
283  // Assume v.n = |v|, n = -v/|v|
284 
285  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++) {
286  Phi_Inf[iDim] +=PsiE_Inf*(SoundSpeed*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One/vel2-1)*vel_inf[iDim];
287  // Assumes n in direction of v
288  Phi_Inf[iDim]+=vel_inf[iDim]/vel*(0.5);
289  }
290 
291  }
292 
293  /*--- Initialize the solution with the far-field state everywhere. ---*/
294 
295  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
296  node[iPoint] = new CAdjEulerVariable(PsiRho_Inf, Phi_Inf, PsiE_Inf, nDim, nVar, config);
297 
298  /*--- Read the restart metadata. ---*/
299 
300  if (restart && (iMesh == MESH_0)) {
301  mesh_filename = config->GetSolution_AdjFileName();
302  filename = config->GetObjFunc_Extension(mesh_filename);
303  Read_SU2_Restart_Metadata(geometry, config, true, filename);
304  }
305 
306  /*--- Define solver parameters needed for execution of destructor ---*/
307 
308  if (config->GetKind_ConvNumScheme_AdjFlow() == SPACE_CENTERED) space_centered = true;
309  else space_centered = false;
310 
311 
312  /*--- Calculate area monitored for area-averaged-outflow-quantity-based objectives ---*/
313 
314  myArea_Monitored = 0.0;
315  for (iMarker_Monitoring = 0; iMarker_Monitoring < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); iMarker_Monitoring++) {
316  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring)==SURFACE_TOTAL_PRESSURE ||
317  config->GetKind_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring)==SURFACE_STATIC_PRESSURE) {
318 
319  Monitoring_Tag = config->GetMarker_Monitoring_TagBound(iMarker_Monitoring);
320  /*-- Find the marker index ---*/
321  iMarker = 0;
322  for (jMarker= 0; jMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); jMarker++) {
323  Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(jMarker);
324  if (Marker_Tag == Monitoring_Tag) {
325  iMarker = jMarker;
326  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
327  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
328  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
329  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
330  Area = 0.0;
331  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
332  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
333  myArea_Monitored += sqrt (Area);
334  }
335  }
336  break;
337  }
338  }
339  }
340  }
341 
342 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
343  Area_Monitored = 0.0;
344  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&myArea_Monitored, &Area_Monitored, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
345 #else
346  Area_Monitored = myArea_Monitored;
347 #endif
348 
349  if (config->GetnObj() > 1 && iMesh==MESH_0) {
350  if (grid_movement) {
351  Mach2Vel = sqrt(Gamma*Gas_Constant*config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND());
352  RefVel2 = (Mach_Motion*Mach2Vel)*(Mach_Motion*Mach2Vel);
353  }
354  else {
355  Velocity_Inf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
356  RefVel2 = 0.0;
357  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
358  RefVel2 += Velocity_Inf[iDim]*Velocity_Inf[iDim];
359  }
360 
361  /*--- Objective scaling: a factor must be applied to certain objectives ---*/
362  for (iMarker_Monitoring = 0; iMarker_Monitoring < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); iMarker_Monitoring++) {
363  Weight_ObjFunc = config->GetWeight_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring);
364 
365  factor = 1.0/(0.5*RefDensity*RefArea*RefVel2);
366 
367  ObjFunc = config->GetKind_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring);
368  if ((ObjFunc == INVERSE_DESIGN_HEATFLUX) ||
369  (ObjFunc == TOTAL_HEATFLUX) || (ObjFunc == MAXIMUM_HEATFLUX) ||
370  (ObjFunc == SURFACE_MASSFLOW) ) factor = 1.0;
371 
372  if ((ObjFunc == SURFACE_TOTAL_PRESSURE) || (ObjFunc == SURFACE_STATIC_PRESSURE))
373  factor = 1.0/Area_Monitored;
374 
375  Weight_ObjFunc = Weight_ObjFunc*factor;
376  config->SetWeight_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring, Weight_ObjFunc);
377  }
378  }
379 
380  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
381  Set_MPI_Solution(geometry, config);
382 
383  if(Normal != NULL) delete [] Normal;
384 
385 }
386 
387 CAdjEulerSolver::~CAdjEulerSolver(void) {
388  unsigned short iVar, iMarker;
389 
390  if (Phi_Inf != NULL) delete [] Phi_Inf;
391  if (Sens_Mach != NULL) delete [] Sens_Mach;
392  if (Sens_AoA != NULL) delete [] Sens_AoA;
393  if (Sens_Geo != NULL) delete [] Sens_Geo;
394  if (Sens_Press != NULL) delete [] Sens_Press;
395  if (Sens_Temp != NULL) delete [] Sens_Temp;
396  if (Sens_BPress != NULL) delete [] Sens_BPress;
397  if (iPoint_UndLapl != NULL) delete [] iPoint_UndLapl;
398  if (jPoint_UndLapl != NULL) delete [] jPoint_UndLapl;
399  if (FlowPrimVar_i != NULL) delete [] FlowPrimVar_i;
400  if (FlowPrimVar_j != NULL) delete [] FlowPrimVar_j;
401 
402  if (Jacobian_Axisymmetric != NULL) {
403  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
404  delete Jacobian_Axisymmetric[iVar];
405  delete [] Jacobian_Axisymmetric;
406  }
407 
408  if (CSensitivity != NULL) {
409  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
410  delete [] CSensitivity[iMarker];
411  delete [] CSensitivity;
412  }
413 
414 }
415 
416 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetTime_Step(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config,
417  unsigned short iMesh, unsigned long Iteration) {
418 
419  /*--- Use the flow solution to update the time step
420  * The time step depends on the characteristic velocity, which is the same
421  * for the adjoint and flow solutions, albeit in the opposite direction. ---*/
422  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->SetTime_Step(geometry, solver_container, config, iMesh, Iteration);
423 }
424 
425 
426 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Solution(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
427  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
428  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
429  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi, *Buffer_Receive_U = NULL, *Buffer_Send_U = NULL;
430 
431 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
432  int send_to, receive_from;
433  SU2_MPI::Status status;
434 #endif
435 
436  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
437 
438  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
439  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
440 
441  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
442 
443 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
444  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
445  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
446 #endif
447 
448  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
449  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar;
450 
451  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
452  Buffer_Receive_U = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
453  Buffer_Send_U = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
454 
455  /*--- Copy the solution that should be sended ---*/
456  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
457  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
458  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
459  Buffer_Send_U[iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
460  }
461 
462 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
463 
464  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
465  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_U, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
466  Buffer_Receive_U, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
467 
468 #else
469 
470  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
471  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
472  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
473  Buffer_Receive_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
474  }
475 
476 #endif
477 
478  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
479  delete [] Buffer_Send_U;
480 
481  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
482  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
483 
484  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
485  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
486  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
487 
488  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
489  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
490 
491  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
492  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
493  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
494  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
495 
496  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
497  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
498  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
499  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
500  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
501  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
502  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
503 
504  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
505  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
506  Solution[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
507 
508  /*--- Rotate the momentum components. ---*/
509  if (nDim == 2) {
510  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
511  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
512  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
513  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
514  }
515  else {
516  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
517  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
518  rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
519  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
520  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
521  rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
522  Solution[3] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
523  rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
524  rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
525  }
526 
527  /*--- Copy transformed conserved variables back into buffer. ---*/
528  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
529  node[iPoint]->SetSolution(iVar, Solution[iVar]);
530 
531  }
532 
533  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
534  delete [] Buffer_Receive_U;
535 
536  }
537 
538  }
539 
540 }
541 
542 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Solution_Old(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
543  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
544  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
545  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi,
546  *Buffer_Receive_U = NULL, *Buffer_Send_U = NULL;
547 
548 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
549  int send_to, receive_from;
550  SU2_MPI::Status status;
551 #endif
552 
553  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
554 
555  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
556  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
557 
558  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
559 
560 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
561  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
562  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
563 #endif
564 
565  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
566  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar;
567 
568  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
569  Buffer_Receive_U = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
570  Buffer_Send_U = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
571 
572  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
573  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
574  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
575  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
576  Buffer_Send_U[iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution_Old(iVar);
577  }
578 
579 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
580 
581  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
582  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_U, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
583  Buffer_Receive_U, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
584 
585 #else
586 
587  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
588  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
589  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
590  Buffer_Receive_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
591  }
592 
593 #endif
594 
595  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
596  delete [] Buffer_Send_U;
597 
598  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
599  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
600 
601  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
602  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
603  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
604 
605  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
606  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
607 
608  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
609  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
610  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
611  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
612 
613  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
614  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
615  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
616  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
617  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
618  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
619  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
620 
621  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
622  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
623  Solution[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
624 
625  /*--- Rotate the momentum components. ---*/
626  if (nDim == 2) {
627  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
628  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
629  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
630  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
631  }
632  else {
633  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
634  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
635  rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
636  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
637  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
638  rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
639  Solution[3] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
640  rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
641  rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
642  }
643 
644  /*--- Copy transformed conserved variables back into buffer. ---*/
645  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
646  node[iPoint]->SetSolution_Old(iVar, Solution[iVar]);
647 
648  }
649 
650  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
651  delete [] Buffer_Receive_U;
652 
653  }
654 
655  }
656 }
657 
658 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Solution_Limiter(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
659  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
660  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
661  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi,
662  *Buffer_Receive_Limit = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Limit = NULL;
663 
664 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
665  int send_to, receive_from;
666  SU2_MPI::Status status;
667 #endif
668 
669  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
670 
671  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
672  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
673 
674  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
675 
676 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
677  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
678  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
679 #endif
680 
681  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
682  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar;
683 
684  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
685  Buffer_Receive_Limit = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
686  Buffer_Send_Limit = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
687 
688  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
689  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
690  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
691  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
692  Buffer_Send_Limit[iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetLimiter(iVar);
693  }
694 
695 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
696 
697  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
698  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Limit, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
699  Buffer_Receive_Limit, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
700 
701 #else
702 
703  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
704  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
705  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
706  Buffer_Receive_Limit[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Limit[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
707  }
708 
709 #endif
710 
711  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
712  delete [] Buffer_Send_Limit;
713 
714  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
715  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
716 
717  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
718  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
719  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
720 
721  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
722  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
723 
724  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
725  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
726  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
727  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
728 
729  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
730  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
731  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
732  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
733  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
734  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
735  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
736 
737  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
738  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
739  Solution[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_Limit[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
740 
741  /*--- Rotate the momentum components. ---*/
742  if (nDim == 2) {
743  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
744  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
745  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
746  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
747  }
748  else {
749  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
750  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
751  rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
752  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
753  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
754  rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
755  Solution[3] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
756  rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
757  rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
758  }
759 
760  /*--- Copy transformed conserved variables back into buffer. ---*/
761  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
762  node[iPoint]->SetLimiter(iVar, Solution[iVar]);
763 
764  }
765 
766  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
767  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Limit;
768 
769  }
770 
771  }
772 }
773 
774 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Solution_Gradient(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
775  unsigned short iVar, iDim, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
776  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
777  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi,
778  *Buffer_Receive_Gradient = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Gradient = NULL;
779 
780 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
781  int send_to, receive_from;
782  SU2_MPI::Status status;
783 #endif
784 
785  su2double **Gradient = new su2double* [nVar];
786  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
787  Gradient[iVar] = new su2double[nDim];
788 
789  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
790 
791  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
792  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
793 
794  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
795 
796 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
797  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
798  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
799 #endif
800 
801  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
802  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar*nDim; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar*nDim;
803 
804  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
805  Buffer_Receive_Gradient = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
806  Buffer_Send_Gradient = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
807 
808  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
809  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
810  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
811  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
812  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
813  Buffer_Send_Gradient[iDim*nVar*nVertexS+iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetGradient(iVar, iDim);
814  }
815 
816 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
817 
818  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
819  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Gradient, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
820  Buffer_Receive_Gradient, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
821 #else
822 
823  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
824  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
825  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
826  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
827  Buffer_Receive_Gradient[iDim*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Gradient[iDim*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
828  }
829 
830 #endif
831 
832  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
833  delete [] Buffer_Send_Gradient;
834 
835  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
836  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
837 
838  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
839  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
840  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
841 
842  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
843  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
844 
845  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
846  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
847  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
848  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
849 
850  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
851  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
852  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
853  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
854  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
855  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
856  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
857 
858  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
859  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
860  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
861  Gradient[iVar][iDim] = Buffer_Receive_Gradient[iDim*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
862 
863  /*--- Need to rotate the gradients for all conserved variables. ---*/
864  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
865  if (nDim == 2) {
866  Gradient[iVar][0] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
867  Gradient[iVar][1] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
868  }
869  else {
870  Gradient[iVar][0] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[2*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
871  Gradient[iVar][1] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[2*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
872  Gradient[iVar][2] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[2*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
873  }
874  }
875 
876  /*--- Store the received information ---*/
877  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
878  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
879  node[iPoint]->SetGradient(iVar, iDim, Gradient[iVar][iDim]);
880 
881  }
882 
883  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
884  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Gradient;
885 
886  }
887 
888  }
889 
890  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
891  delete [] Gradient[iVar];
892  delete [] Gradient;
893 
894 }
895 
896 
897 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Undivided_Laplacian(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
898  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
899  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
900  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi,
901  *Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian = NULL;
902 
903 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
904  int send_to, receive_from;
905  SU2_MPI::Status status;
906 #endif
907 
908  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
909 
910  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
911  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
912 
913  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
914 
915 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
916  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
917  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
918 #endif
919 
920  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
921  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar;
922 
923  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
924  Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
925  Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
926 
927  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
928  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
929  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
930  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
931  Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian[iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetUndivided_Laplacian(iVar);
932  }
933 
934 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
935 
936  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
937  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
938  Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
939 #else
940 
941  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
942  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
943  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
944  Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
945  }
946 
947 #endif
948 
949  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
950  delete [] Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian;
951 
952  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
953  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
954 
955  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
956  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
957  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
958 
959  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
960  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
961 
962  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
963  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
964  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
965  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
966 
967  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
968  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
969  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
970  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
971  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
972  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
973  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
974 
975  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
976  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
977  Solution[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
978 
979  /*--- Rotate the momentum components. ---*/
980  if (nDim == 2) {
981  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
982  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
983  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
984  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
985  }
986  else {
987  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
988  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
989  rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
990  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
991  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
992  rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
993  Solution[3] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
994  rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
995  rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
996  }
997 
998  /*--- Copy transformed conserved variables back into buffer. ---*/
999  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1000  node[iPoint]->SetUndivided_Laplacian(iVar, Solution[iVar]);
1001 
1002  }
1003 
1004  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
1005  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian;
1006 
1007  }
1008 
1009  }
1010 
1011 }
1012 
1013 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Sensor(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
1014  unsigned short iMarker, MarkerS, MarkerR;
1015  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
1016  su2double *Buffer_Receive_Lambda = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Lambda = NULL;
1017 
1018 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1019  int send_to, receive_from;
1020  SU2_MPI::Status status;
1021 #endif
1022 
1023  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
1024 
1025  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
1026  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
1027 
1028  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
1029 
1030 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1031  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
1032  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
1033 #endif
1034 
1035  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
1036  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR;
1037 
1038  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
1039  Buffer_Receive_Lambda = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
1040  Buffer_Send_Lambda = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
1041 
1042  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
1043  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
1044  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
1045  Buffer_Send_Lambda[iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetSensor();
1046  }
1047 
1048 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1049 
1050  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
1051  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Lambda, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
1052  Buffer_Receive_Lambda, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
1053 #else
1054 
1055  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
1056  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
1057  Buffer_Receive_Lambda[iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Lambda[iVertex];
1058  }
1059 
1060 #endif
1061 
1062  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
1063  delete [] Buffer_Send_Lambda;
1064 
1065  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
1066  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
1067 
1068  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
1069  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
1070  node[iPoint]->SetSensor(Buffer_Receive_Lambda[iVertex]);
1071 
1072  }
1073 
1074  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
1075  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Lambda;
1076 
1077  }
1078 
1079  }
1080 }
1081 
1082 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_ActDisk(CSolver **solver_container, CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
1083 
1084  unsigned long iter, iPoint, iVertex, jVertex, iPointTotal,
1085  Buffer_Send_nPointTotal = 0, iGlobalIndex, iGlobal;
1086  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, jMarker;
1087  long nDomain = 0, iDomain, jDomain;
1088 
1089 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1090 
1091  /*--- MPI status and request arrays for non-blocking communications ---*/
1092 
1093  SU2_MPI::Status status, status_;
1094 
1095 
1096 #endif
1097 
1098  /*--- Define buffer vector interior domain ---*/
1099 
1100  su2double *Buffer_Send_AdjVar = NULL;
1101  su2double *iAdjVar = new su2double [nVar];
1102 
1103  unsigned long *nPointTotal_s = new unsigned long[size];
1104  unsigned long *nPointTotal_r = new unsigned long[size];
1105 
1106  unsigned long Buffer_Size_AdjVar = 0;
1107  unsigned long PointTotal_Counter = 0;
1108 
1109  /*--- Allocate the memory that we only need if we have MPI support ---*/
1110 
1111  su2double *Buffer_Receive_AdjVar = NULL;
1112 
1113  /*--- Basic dimensionalization ---*/
1114 
1115  nDomain = size;
1116 
1117  /*--- This loop gets the array sizes of points for each
1118  rank to send to each other rank. ---*/
1119 
1120  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
1121 
1122  /*--- Loop over the markers to perform the dimensionalizaton
1123  of the domain variables ---*/
1124 
1125  Buffer_Send_nPointTotal = 0;
1126 
1127  /*--- Loop over all of the markers and count the number of each
1128  type of point and element that needs to be sent. ---*/
1129 
1130  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
1131  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ACTDISK_INLET) ||
1132  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ACTDISK_OUTLET)) {
1133  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
1134  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1135  jDomain = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorProcessor();
1136  if ((iDomain == jDomain) && (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())) {
1137  Buffer_Send_nPointTotal++;
1138  }
1139  }
1140  }
1141  }
1142 
1143  /*--- Store the counts on a partition by partition basis. ---*/
1144 
1145  nPointTotal_s[iDomain] = Buffer_Send_nPointTotal;
1146 
1147  /*--- Total counts for allocating send buffers below ---*/
1148 
1149  Buffer_Size_AdjVar += nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3);
1150 
1151  }
1152 
1153  /*--- Allocate the buffer vectors in the appropiate domain (master, iDomain) ---*/
1154 
1155  Buffer_Send_AdjVar = new su2double[Buffer_Size_AdjVar];
1156 
1157  /*--- Now that we know the sizes of the point, we can
1158  allocate and send the information in large chunks to all processors. ---*/
1159 
1160  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
1161 
1162  /*--- A rank does not communicate with itself through MPI ---*/
1163 
1164  if (rank != iDomain) {
1165 
1166 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1167 
1168  /*--- Communicate the counts to iDomain with non-blocking sends ---*/
1169 
1170  SU2_MPI::Bsend(&nPointTotal_s[iDomain], 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, iDomain, iDomain, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1171 
1172 #endif
1173 
1174  } else {
1175 
1176  /*--- If iDomain = rank, we simply copy values into place in memory ---*/
1177 
1178  nPointTotal_r[iDomain] = nPointTotal_s[iDomain];
1179 
1180  }
1181 
1182  /*--- Receive the counts. All processors are sending their counters to
1183  iDomain up above, so only iDomain needs to perform the recv here from
1184  all other ranks. ---*/
1185 
1186  if (rank == iDomain) {
1187 
1188  for (jDomain = 0; jDomain < size; jDomain++) {
1189 
1190  /*--- A rank does not communicate with itself through MPI ---*/
1191 
1192  if (rank != jDomain) {
1193 
1194 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1195 
1196  /*--- Recv the data by probing for the current sender, jDomain,
1197  first and then receiving the values from it. ---*/
1198 
1199  SU2_MPI::Recv(&nPointTotal_r[jDomain], 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, jDomain, rank, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
1200 
1201 #endif
1202 
1203  }
1204  }
1205 
1206  }
1207  }
1208 
1209  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
1210 
1211 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1212 
1213  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1214 
1215 #endif
1216 
1217  /*--- Initialize the counters for the larger send buffers (by domain) ---*/
1218 
1219  PointTotal_Counter = 0;
1220 
1221  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
1222 
1223  /*--- Set the value of the interior geometry. Initialize counters. ---*/
1224 
1225  iPointTotal = 0;
1226 
1227  /*--- Load up the actual values into the buffers for sending. ---*/
1228 
1229  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
1230 
1231  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ACTDISK_INLET) ||
1232  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ACTDISK_OUTLET)) {
1233 
1234  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
1235  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1236  jDomain = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorProcessor();
1237  if ((iDomain == jDomain) && (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())) {
1238 
1239  iGlobalIndex = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
1240  jVertex = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorVertex();
1241  jMarker = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorMarker();
1242 
1243  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1244  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
1245  }
1246  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+(nVar+0)] = su2double(iGlobalIndex);
1247  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+(nVar+1)] = su2double(jVertex);
1248  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+(nVar+2)] = su2double(jMarker);
1249 
1250  iPointTotal++;
1251 
1252  }
1253 
1254  }
1255 
1256  }
1257 
1258  }
1259 
1260  /*--- Send the buffers with the geometrical information ---*/
1261 
1262  if (iDomain != rank) {
1263 
1264 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1265 
1266  /*--- Communicate the coordinates, global index, colors, and element
1267  date to iDomain with non-blocking sends. ---*/
1268 
1269  SU2_MPI::Bsend(&Buffer_Send_AdjVar[PointTotal_Counter*(nVar+3)],
1270  nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3), MPI_DOUBLE, iDomain,
1271  iDomain, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1272 
1273 #endif
1274 
1275  }
1276 
1277  else {
1278 
1279  /*--- Allocate local memory for the local recv of the elements ---*/
1280 
1281  Buffer_Receive_AdjVar = new su2double[nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3)];
1282 
1283  for (iter = 0; iter < nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3); iter++)
1284  Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iter] = Buffer_Send_AdjVar[PointTotal_Counter*(nVar+3)+iter];
1285 
1286  /*--- Recv the point data from ourselves (same procedure as above) ---*/
1287 
1288  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointTotal_r[iDomain]; iPoint++) {
1289 
1290  iGlobal = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+0)]);
1291  iVertex = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+1)]);
1292  iMarker = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+2)]);
1293  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1294  iAdjVar[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+iVar];
1295 
1296  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1297  SetDonorAdjVar(iMarker, iVertex, iVar, iAdjVar[iVar]);
1298 
1299  SetDonorGlobalIndex(iMarker, iVertex, iGlobal);
1300 
1301  }
1302 
1303  /*--- Delete memory for recv the point stuff ---*/
1304 
1305  delete [] Buffer_Receive_AdjVar;
1306 
1307  }
1308 
1309  /*--- Increment the counters for the send buffers (iDomain loop) ---*/
1310 
1311  PointTotal_Counter += iPointTotal;
1312 
1313  }
1314 
1315  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
1316 
1317 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1318 
1319  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1320 
1321 #endif
1322 
1323  /*--- The next section begins the recv of all data for the interior
1324  points/elements in the mesh. First, create the domain structures for
1325  the points on this rank. First, we recv all of the point data ---*/
1326 
1327  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < size; iDomain++) {
1328 
1329  if (rank != iDomain) {
1330 
1331 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1332 
1333  /*--- Allocate the receive buffer vector. Send the colors so that we
1334  know whether what we recv is an owned or halo node. ---*/
1335 
1336  Buffer_Receive_AdjVar = new su2double [nPointTotal_r[iDomain]*nVar];
1337 
1338  /*--- Receive the buffers with the coords, global index, and colors ---*/
1339 
1340  SU2_MPI::Recv(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar, nPointTotal_r[iDomain]*(nVar+3) , MPI_DOUBLE,
1341  iDomain, rank, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status_);
1342 
1343  /*--- Loop over all of the points that we have recv'd and store the
1344  coords, global index vertex and markers ---*/
1345 
1346  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointTotal_r[iDomain]; iPoint++) {
1347 
1348  iGlobal = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+0)]);
1349  iVertex = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+1)]);
1350  iMarker = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+2)]);
1351  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1352  iAdjVar[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+iVar];
1353 
1354  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1355  SetDonorAdjVar(iMarker, iVertex, iVar, iAdjVar[iVar]);
1356 
1357  SetDonorGlobalIndex(iMarker, iVertex, iGlobal);
1358 
1359  }
1360 
1361  /*--- Delete memory for recv the point stuff ---*/
1362 
1363  delete [] Buffer_Receive_AdjVar;
1364 
1365 #endif
1366 
1367  }
1368 
1369  }
1370 
1371  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
1372 
1373 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1374 
1375  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1376 
1377 #endif
1378 
1379  /*--- Free all of the memory used for communicating points and elements ---*/
1380 
1381  delete[] Buffer_Send_AdjVar;
1382 
1383  /*--- Release all of the temporary memory ---*/
1384 
1385  delete [] nPointTotal_s;
1386  delete [] nPointTotal_r;
1387  delete [] iAdjVar;
1388 
1389 }
1390 
1391 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Nearfield(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
1392 
1393  unsigned long iter, iPoint, iVertex, jVertex, iPointTotal,
1394  Buffer_Send_nPointTotal = 0, iGlobalIndex, iGlobal;
1395  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, jMarker;
1396  long nDomain = 0, iDomain, jDomain;
1397 
1398 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1399 
1400  /*--- MPI status and request arrays for non-blocking communications ---*/
1401 
1402  SU2_MPI::Status status, status_;
1403 
1404 
1405 #endif
1406 
1407  /*--- Define buffer vector interior domain ---*/
1408 
1409  su2double *Buffer_Send_AdjVar = NULL;
1410 
1411  unsigned long *nPointTotal_s = new unsigned long[size];
1412  unsigned long *nPointTotal_r = new unsigned long[size];
1413  su2double *iAdjVar = new su2double [nVar];
1414 
1415  unsigned long Buffer_Size_AdjVar = 0;
1416 
1417  unsigned long PointTotal_Counter = 0;
1418 
1419  /*--- Allocate the memory that we only need if we have MPI support ---*/
1420 
1421 
1422  su2double *Buffer_Receive_AdjVar = NULL;
1423 
1424  /*--- Basic dimensionalization ---*/
1425 
1426  nDomain = size;
1427 
1428 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1429 
1430  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1431 
1432 #endif
1433 
1434  /*--- This loop gets the array sizes of points for each
1435  rank to send to each other rank. ---*/
1436 
1437  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
1438 
1439  /*--- Loop over the markers to perform the dimensionalizaton
1440  of the domain variables ---*/
1441 
1442  Buffer_Send_nPointTotal = 0;
1443 
1444  /*--- Loop over all of the markers and count the number of each
1445  type of point and element that needs to be sent. ---*/
1446 
1447  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
1448  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY) {
1449  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
1450  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1451  jDomain = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorProcessor();
1452  if ((iDomain == jDomain) && (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())) {
1453  Buffer_Send_nPointTotal++;
1454  }
1455  }
1456  }
1457  }
1458 
1459  /*--- Store the counts on a partition by partition basis. ---*/
1460 
1461  nPointTotal_s[iDomain] = Buffer_Send_nPointTotal;
1462 
1463  /*--- Total counts for allocating send buffers below ---*/
1464 
1465  Buffer_Size_AdjVar += nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3);
1466 
1467  }
1468 
1469  /*--- Allocate the buffer vectors in the appropiate domain (master, iDomain) ---*/
1470 
1471  Buffer_Send_AdjVar = new su2double[Buffer_Size_AdjVar];
1472 
1473  /*--- Now that we know the sizes of the point, we can
1474  allocate and send the information in large chunks to all processors. ---*/
1475 
1476  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
1477 
1478  /*--- A rank does not communicate with itself through MPI ---*/
1479 
1480  if (rank != iDomain) {
1481 
1482 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1483 
1484  /*--- Communicate the counts to iDomain with non-blocking sends ---*/
1485 
1486  SU2_MPI::Bsend(&nPointTotal_s[iDomain], 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, iDomain, iDomain, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1487 
1488 #endif
1489 
1490  } else {
1491 
1492  /*--- If iDomain = rank, we simply copy values into place in memory ---*/
1493 
1494  nPointTotal_r[iDomain] = nPointTotal_s[iDomain];
1495 
1496  }
1497 
1498  /*--- Receive the counts. All processors are sending their counters to
1499  iDomain up above, so only iDomain needs to perform the recv here from
1500  all other ranks. ---*/
1501 
1502  if (rank == iDomain) {
1503 
1504  for (jDomain = 0; jDomain < size; jDomain++) {
1505 
1506  /*--- A rank does not communicate with itself through MPI ---*/
1507 
1508  if (rank != jDomain) {
1509 
1510 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1511 
1512  /*--- Recv the data by probing for the current sender, jDomain,
1513  first and then receiving the values from it. ---*/
1514 
1515  SU2_MPI::Recv(&nPointTotal_r[jDomain], 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, jDomain, rank, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
1516 
1517 #endif
1518 
1519  }
1520  }
1521 
1522  }
1523  }
1524 
1525  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
1526 
1527 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1528 
1529  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1530 
1531 #endif
1532 
1533  /*--- Initialize the counters for the larger send buffers (by domain) ---*/
1534 
1535  PointTotal_Counter = 0;
1536 
1537  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
1538 
1539  /*--- Set the value of the interior geometry. Initialize counters. ---*/
1540 
1541  iPointTotal = 0;
1542 
1543  /*--- Load up the actual values into the buffers for sending. ---*/
1544 
1545  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
1546 
1547  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY) {
1548 
1549  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
1550  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1551  jDomain = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorProcessor();
1552  if ((iDomain == jDomain) && (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())) {
1553 
1554  iGlobalIndex = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
1555  jVertex = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorVertex();
1556  jMarker = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorMarker();
1557 
1558  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1559  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
1560  }
1561  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+(nVar+0)] = su2double(iGlobalIndex);
1562  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+(nVar+1)] = su2double(jVertex);
1563  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+(nVar+2)] = su2double(jMarker);
1564 
1565  iPointTotal++;
1566 
1567  }
1568 
1569  }
1570 
1571  }
1572 
1573  }
1574 
1575  /*--- Send the buffers with the geometrical information ---*/
1576 
1577  if (iDomain != rank) {
1578 
1579 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1580 
1581  /*--- Communicate the coordinates, global index, colors, and element
1582  date to iDomain with non-blocking sends. ---*/
1583 
1584  SU2_MPI::Bsend(&Buffer_Send_AdjVar[PointTotal_Counter*(nVar+3)],
1585  nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3), MPI_DOUBLE, iDomain,
1586  iDomain, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1587 
1588 #endif
1589 
1590  }
1591 
1592  else {
1593 
1594  /*--- Allocate local memory for the local recv of the elements ---*/
1595 
1596  Buffer_Receive_AdjVar = new su2double[nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3)];
1597 
1598  for (iter = 0; iter < nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3); iter++)
1599  Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iter] = Buffer_Send_AdjVar[PointTotal_Counter*(nVar+3)+iter];
1600 
1601  /*--- Recv the point data from ourselves (same procedure as above) ---*/
1602 
1603  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointTotal_r[iDomain]; iPoint++) {
1604 
1605  iGlobal = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+0)]);
1606  iVertex = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+1)]);
1607  iMarker = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+2)]);
1608  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1609  iAdjVar[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+iVar];
1610 
1611  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1612  SetDonorAdjVar(iMarker, iVertex, iVar, iAdjVar[iVar]);
1613 
1614  SetDonorGlobalIndex(iMarker, iVertex, iGlobal);
1615 
1616  }
1617 
1618  /*--- Delete memory for recv the point stuff ---*/
1619 
1620  delete [] Buffer_Receive_AdjVar;
1621 
1622  }
1623 
1624  /*--- Increment the counters for the send buffers (iDomain loop) ---*/
1625 
1626  PointTotal_Counter += iPointTotal;
1627 
1628  }
1629 
1630  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
1631 
1632 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1633 
1634  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1635 
1636 #endif
1637 
1638  /*--- The next section begins the recv of all data for the interior
1639  points/elements in the mesh. First, create the domain structures for
1640  the points on this rank. First, we recv all of the point data ---*/
1641 
1642  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < size; iDomain++) {
1643 
1644  if (rank != iDomain) {
1645 
1646 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1647 
1648  /*--- Allocate the receive buffer vector. Send the colors so that we
1649  know whether what we recv is an owned or halo node. ---*/
1650 
1651  Buffer_Receive_AdjVar = new su2double [nPointTotal_r[iDomain]*(nVar+3)];
1652 
1653  /*--- Receive the buffers with the coords, global index, and colors ---*/
1654 
1655  SU2_MPI::Recv(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar, nPointTotal_r[iDomain]*(nVar+3) , MPI_DOUBLE,
1656  iDomain, rank, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status_);
1657 
1658 
1659  /*--- Loop over all of the points that we have recv'd and store the
1660  coords, global index vertex and markers ---*/
1661 
1662  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointTotal_r[iDomain]; iPoint++) {
1663 
1664  iGlobal = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+0)]);
1665  iVertex = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+1)]);
1666  iMarker = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+2)]);
1667  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1668  iAdjVar[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+iVar];
1669 
1670  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1671  SetDonorAdjVar(iMarker, iVertex, iVar, iAdjVar[iVar]);
1672 
1673  SetDonorGlobalIndex(iMarker, iVertex, iGlobal);
1674 
1675  }
1676 
1677  /*--- Delete memory for recv the point stuff ---*/
1678 
1679  delete [] Buffer_Receive_AdjVar;
1680 
1681 #endif
1682 
1683  }
1684 
1685  }
1686 
1687  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
1688 
1689 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1690 
1691  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1692 
1693 #endif
1694 
1695  /*--- Free all of the memory used for communicating points and elements ---*/
1696 
1697  delete[] Buffer_Send_AdjVar;
1698 
1699  /*--- Release all of the temporary memory ---*/
1700 
1701  delete [] nPointTotal_s;
1702  delete [] nPointTotal_r;
1703  delete [] iAdjVar;
1704 
1705 }
1706 
1707 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Interface(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
1708 
1709  unsigned long iter, iPoint, iVertex, jVertex, iPointTotal,
1710  Buffer_Send_nPointTotal = 0, iGlobalIndex, iGlobal;
1711  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, jMarker;
1712  long nDomain = 0, iDomain, jDomain;
1713 
1714 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1715 
1716  /*--- MPI status and request arrays for non-blocking communications ---*/
1717 
1718  SU2_MPI::Status status, status_;
1719 
1720 
1721 #endif
1722 
1723  /*--- Define buffer vector interior domain ---*/
1724 
1725  su2double *Buffer_Send_AdjVar = NULL;
1726  su2double *iAdjVar = new su2double [nVar];
1727 
1728  unsigned long *nPointTotal_s = new unsigned long[size];
1729  unsigned long *nPointTotal_r = new unsigned long[size];
1730 
1731  unsigned long Buffer_Size_AdjVar = 0;
1732  unsigned long PointTotal_Counter = 0;
1733 
1734  /*--- Allocate the memory that we only need if we have MPI support ---*/
1735 
1736  su2double *Buffer_Receive_AdjVar = NULL;
1737 
1738  /*--- Basic dimensionalization ---*/
1739 
1740  nDomain = size;
1741 
1742  /*--- This loop gets the array sizes of points for each
1743  rank to send to each other rank. ---*/
1744 
1745  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
1746 
1747  /*--- Loop over the markers to perform the dimensionalizaton
1748  of the domain variables ---*/
1749 
1750  Buffer_Send_nPointTotal = 0;
1751 
1752  /*--- Loop over all of the markers and count the number of each
1753  type of point and element that needs to be sent. ---*/
1754 
1755  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
1756  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INTERFACE_BOUNDARY) {
1757  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
1758  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1759  jDomain = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorProcessor();
1760  if ((iDomain == jDomain) && (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())) {
1761  Buffer_Send_nPointTotal++;
1762  }
1763  }
1764  }
1765  }
1766 
1767  /*--- Store the counts on a partition by partition basis. ---*/
1768 
1769  nPointTotal_s[iDomain] = Buffer_Send_nPointTotal;
1770 
1771  /*--- Total counts for allocating send buffers below ---*/
1772 
1773  Buffer_Size_AdjVar += nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3);
1774 
1775  }
1776 
1777  /*--- Allocate the buffer vectors in the appropiate domain (master, iDomain) ---*/
1778 
1779  Buffer_Send_AdjVar = new su2double[Buffer_Size_AdjVar];
1780 
1781  /*--- Now that we know the sizes of the point, we can
1782  allocate and send the information in large chunks to all processors. ---*/
1783 
1784  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
1785 
1786  /*--- A rank does not communicate with itself through MPI ---*/
1787 
1788  if (rank != iDomain) {
1789 
1790 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1791 
1792  /*--- Communicate the counts to iDomain with non-blocking sends ---*/
1793 
1794  SU2_MPI::Bsend(&nPointTotal_s[iDomain], 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, iDomain, iDomain, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1795 
1796 #endif
1797 
1798  } else {
1799 
1800  /*--- If iDomain = rank, we simply copy values into place in memory ---*/
1801 
1802  nPointTotal_r[iDomain] = nPointTotal_s[iDomain];
1803 
1804  }
1805 
1806  /*--- Receive the counts. All processors are sending their counters to
1807  iDomain up above, so only iDomain needs to perform the recv here from
1808  all other ranks. ---*/
1809 
1810  if (rank == iDomain) {
1811 
1812  for (jDomain = 0; jDomain < size; jDomain++) {
1813 
1814  /*--- A rank does not communicate with itself through MPI ---*/
1815 
1816  if (rank != jDomain) {
1817 
1818 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1819 
1820  /*--- Recv the data by probing for the current sender, jDomain,
1821  first and then receiving the values from it. ---*/
1822 
1823  SU2_MPI::Probe(jDomain, rank, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
1824  SU2_MPI::Recv(&nPointTotal_r[jDomain], 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, jDomain, rank, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
1825 
1826 #endif
1827 
1828  }
1829  }
1830 
1831  }
1832  }
1833 
1834  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
1835 
1836 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1837 
1838  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1839 
1840 #endif
1841 
1842  /*--- Initialize the counters for the larger send buffers (by domain) ---*/
1843 
1844  PointTotal_Counter = 0;
1845 
1846  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
1847 
1848  /*--- Set the value of the interior geometry. Initialize counters. ---*/
1849 
1850  iPointTotal = 0;
1851 
1852  /*--- Load up the actual values into the buffers for sending. ---*/
1853 
1854  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
1855 
1856  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INTERFACE_BOUNDARY) {
1857 
1858  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
1859  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1860  jDomain = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorProcessor();
1861  if ((iDomain == jDomain) && (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())) {
1862 
1863  iGlobalIndex = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
1864  jVertex = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorVertex();
1865  jMarker = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorMarker();
1866 
1867  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1868  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
1869  }
1870  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+(nVar+0)] = su2double(iGlobalIndex);
1871  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+(nVar+1)] = su2double(jVertex);
1872  Buffer_Send_AdjVar[(nVar+3)*(PointTotal_Counter+iPointTotal)+(nVar+2)] = su2double(jMarker);
1873 
1874  iPointTotal++;
1875 
1876  }
1877 
1878  }
1879 
1880  }
1881 
1882  }
1883 
1884  /*--- Send the buffers with the geometrical information ---*/
1885 
1886  if (iDomain != rank) {
1887 
1888 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1889 
1890  /*--- Communicate the coordinates, global index, colors, and element
1891  date to iDomain with non-blocking sends. ---*/
1892 
1893  SU2_MPI::Bsend(&Buffer_Send_AdjVar[PointTotal_Counter*(nVar+3)],
1894  nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3), MPI_DOUBLE, iDomain,
1895  iDomain, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1896 
1897 #endif
1898 
1899  }
1900 
1901  else {
1902 
1903  /*--- Allocate local memory for the local recv of the elements ---*/
1904 
1905  Buffer_Receive_AdjVar = new su2double[nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3)];
1906 
1907  for (iter = 0; iter < nPointTotal_s[iDomain]*(nVar+3); iter++)
1908  Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iter] = Buffer_Send_AdjVar[PointTotal_Counter*(nVar+3)+iter];
1909 
1910  /*--- Recv the point data from ourselves (same procedure as above) ---*/
1911 
1912  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointTotal_r[iDomain]; iPoint++) {
1913 
1914  iGlobal = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+0)]);
1915  iVertex = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+1)]);
1916  iMarker = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+2)]);
1917  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1918  iAdjVar[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+iVar];
1919 
1920  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1921  SetDonorAdjVar(iMarker, iVertex, iVar, iAdjVar[iVar]);
1922 
1923  SetDonorGlobalIndex(iMarker, iVertex, iGlobal);
1924 
1925  }
1926 
1927  /*--- Delete memory for recv the point stuff ---*/
1928 
1929  delete [] Buffer_Receive_AdjVar;
1930 
1931  }
1932 
1933  /*--- Increment the counters for the send buffers (iDomain loop) ---*/
1934 
1935  PointTotal_Counter += iPointTotal;
1936 
1937  }
1938 
1939  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
1940 
1941 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1942 
1943  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1944 
1945 #endif
1946 
1947  /*--- The next section begins the recv of all data for the interior
1948  points/elements in the mesh. First, create the domain structures for
1949  the points on this rank. First, we recv all of the point data ---*/
1950 
1951  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < size; iDomain++) {
1952 
1953  if (rank != iDomain) {
1954 
1955 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1956 
1957  /*--- Allocate the receive buffer vector. Send the colors so that we
1958  know whether what we recv is an owned or halo node. ---*/
1959 
1960  Buffer_Receive_AdjVar = new su2double [nPointTotal_r[iDomain]*(nVar+3)];
1961 
1962  /*--- Receive the buffers with the coords, global index, and colors ---*/
1963 
1964  SU2_MPI::Recv(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar, nPointTotal_r[iDomain]*(nVar+3) , MPI_DOUBLE,
1965  iDomain, rank, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status_);
1966 
1967 
1968  /*--- Loop over all of the points that we have recv'd and store the
1969  coords, global index vertex and markers ---*/
1970 
1971  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointTotal_r[iDomain]; iPoint++) {
1972 
1973  iGlobal = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+0)]);
1974  iVertex = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+1)]);
1975  iMarker = SU2_TYPE::Int(Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+(nVar+2)]);
1976  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1977  iAdjVar[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_AdjVar[iPoint*(nVar+3)+iVar];
1978 
1979  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1980  SetDonorAdjVar(iMarker, iVertex, iVar, iAdjVar[iVar]);
1981 
1982  SetDonorGlobalIndex(iMarker, iVertex, iGlobal);
1983 
1984  }
1985 
1986  /*--- Delete memory for recv the point stuff ---*/
1987 
1988  delete [] Buffer_Receive_AdjVar;
1989 
1990 #endif
1991 
1992  }
1993 
1994  }
1995 
1996  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
1997 
1998 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1999 
2000  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2001 
2002 #endif
2003 
2004  /*--- Free all of the memory used for communicating points and elements ---*/
2005 
2006  delete[] Buffer_Send_AdjVar;
2007 
2008  /*--- Release all of the temporary memory ---*/
2009 
2010  delete [] nPointTotal_s;
2011  delete [] nPointTotal_r;
2012  delete [] iAdjVar;
2013 
2014 }
2015 
2016 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetForceProj_Vector(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
2017 
2018  su2double *ForceProj_Vector, x = 0.0, y = 0.0, z = 0.0, *Normal, CD, CL, Cp, CpTarget,
2019  CT, CQ, x_origin, y_origin, z_origin, WDrag, Area, invCD, CLCD2, invCQ, CTRCQ2;
2020  unsigned short iMarker,jMarker,iMarker_Monitoring, iDim;
2021  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
2022  string Marker_Tag, Monitoring_Tag;
2023  su2double Weight_ObjFunc=1.0;
2024  su2double *ForceProj_Vector2;
2025 
2026  su2double Alpha = (config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER)/180.0;
2027  su2double Beta = (config->GetAoS()*PI_NUMBER)/180.0;
2028  su2double RefLength = config->GetRefLength();
2029  su2double *RefOriginMoment = config->GetRefOriginMoment(0);
2030  su2double dCD_dCL = config->GetdCD_dCL();
2031  su2double dCMx_dCL = config->GetdCMx_dCL();
2032  su2double dCMy_dCL = config->GetdCMy_dCL();
2033  su2double dCMz_dCL = config->GetdCMz_dCL();
2034  su2double dCD_dCMy = config->GetdCD_dCMy();
2035  bool Fixed_CL = config->GetFixed_CL_Mode();
2036  bool Fixed_CM = config->GetFixed_CM_Mode();
2037 
2038  ForceProj_Vector = new su2double[nDim];
2039 
2040  /*--- Compute coefficients needed for objective function evaluation. ---*/
2041 
2042  CD = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetTotal_CD();
2043  CL = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetTotal_CL();
2044  CT = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetTotal_CT();
2045  CQ = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetTotal_CQ();
2046  invCD = 1.0/CD; CLCD2 = CL/(CD*CD);
2047  invCQ = 1.0/CQ; CTRCQ2 = CT/(RefLength*CQ*CQ);
2048 
2049  x_origin = RefOriginMoment[0]; y_origin = RefOriginMoment[1]; z_origin = RefOriginMoment[2];
2050 
2051  /*--- Evaluate the boundary condition coefficients,
2052  Since there may be more than one objective per marker, first we have to set all Force projection vectors to 0 ---*/
2053 
2054  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker<nMarker; iMarker++) {
2055  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) &&
2056  (config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker) == YES))
2057  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2058  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++)
2059  ForceProj_Vector[iDim]=0.0;
2060  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2061  node[iPoint]->SetForceProj_Vector(ForceProj_Vector);
2062  }
2063  }
2064 
2065  /*--- Find the matching iMarker ---*/
2066 
2067  for (iMarker_Monitoring = 0; iMarker_Monitoring < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); iMarker_Monitoring++) {
2068  Weight_ObjFunc = config->GetWeight_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring);
2069  Monitoring_Tag = config->GetMarker_Monitoring_TagBound(iMarker_Monitoring);
2070  for (jMarker=0; jMarker<nMarker; jMarker++) {
2071  Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(jMarker);
2072  if (Monitoring_Tag==Marker_Tag)
2073  iMarker = jMarker;
2074  }
2075 
2076 
2077  if ((iMarker<nMarker) && (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) &&
2078  (config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker) == YES)) {
2079  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2080 
2081  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2082 
2083  x = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(0);
2084  y = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(1);
2085  if (nDim == 3) z = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(2);
2086 
2087  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2088  ForceProj_Vector2 = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
2089  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim;iDim++)
2090  ForceProj_Vector[iDim]=ForceProj_Vector2[iDim];
2091 
2092  switch (config->GetKind_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring)) {
2093  case DRAG_COEFFICIENT :
2094  if (nDim == 2) {
2095 
2096  ForceProj_Vector[0] += Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha);
2097  ForceProj_Vector[1] += Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha);
2098 
2099  /*--- Modification to run at a fixed CL and CM value ---*/
2100 
2101  if (Fixed_CL) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += dCD_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] -= dCD_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha); }
2102  if (Fixed_CM) { ForceProj_Vector[0] -= dCD_dCMy*Weight_ObjFunc*(y - y_origin)/RefLength; ForceProj_Vector[1] += dCD_dCMy*Weight_ObjFunc*(x - x_origin)/RefLength; }
2103 
2104  }
2105  if (nDim == 3) {
2106 
2107  ForceProj_Vector[0] += Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta);
2108  ForceProj_Vector[1] += Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Beta);
2109  ForceProj_Vector[2] += Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta);
2110 
2111  /*--- Modification to run at a fixed CL value ---*/
2112 
2113  if (Fixed_CL) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += dCD_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] -= 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] -= dCD_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha); }
2114  if (Fixed_CM) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += dCD_dCMy*Weight_ObjFunc*(z - z_origin)/RefLength; ForceProj_Vector[1] += 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] -= dCD_dCMy*Weight_ObjFunc*(x - x_origin)/RefLength; }
2115 
2116  }
2117  break;
2118  case LIFT_COEFFICIENT :
2119  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += -Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] += Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha); }
2120  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += -Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] += Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha); }
2121  break;
2122  case SIDEFORCE_COEFFICIENT :
2123  if (nDim == 2) { SU2_MPI::Error("This functional is not possible in 2D!!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);}
2124  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += -Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Beta) * cos(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] += Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Beta); ForceProj_Vector[2] += -Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Beta) * sin(Alpha); }
2125  break;
2126  case INVERSE_DESIGN_PRESSURE :
2127  Cp = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCPressure(iMarker, iVertex);
2128  CpTarget = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCPressureTarget(iMarker, iVertex);
2129  Area = sqrt(Normal[0]*Normal[0] + Normal[1]*Normal[1]);
2130  if (nDim == 3) Area = sqrt(Normal[0]*Normal[0] + Normal[1]*Normal[1] + Normal[2]*Normal[2]);
