2131  ForceProj_Vector[0] += -Weight_ObjFunc*2.0*(Cp-CpTarget)*Normal[0]/Area; ForceProj_Vector[1] += -Weight_ObjFunc*2.0*(Cp-CpTarget)*Normal[1]/Area;
2132  if (nDim == 3) ForceProj_Vector[2] += -Weight_ObjFunc*2.0*(Cp-CpTarget)*Normal[2]/Area;
2133  break;
2134  case MOMENT_X_COEFFICIENT :
2135  if (nDim == 2) { SU2_MPI::Error("This functional is not possible in 2D!!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);}
2136  if (nDim == 3) {
2137 
2138  ForceProj_Vector[0] += 0.0;
2139  ForceProj_Vector[1] += -Weight_ObjFunc*(z - z_origin)/RefLength;
2140  ForceProj_Vector[2] += Weight_ObjFunc*(y - y_origin)/RefLength;
2141 
2142  /*--- Modification to run at a fixed CL value ---*/
2143 
2144  if (Fixed_CL) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += dCMx_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] -= 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] -= dCMx_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha); }
2145 
2146  }
2147  break;
2148  case MOMENT_Y_COEFFICIENT :
2149  if (nDim == 2) { SU2_MPI::Error("This functional is not possible in 2D!!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);}
2150  if (nDim == 3) {
2151 
2152  ForceProj_Vector[0] += Weight_ObjFunc*(z - z_origin)/RefLength;
2153  ForceProj_Vector[1] += 0.0;
2154  ForceProj_Vector[2] += -Weight_ObjFunc*(x - x_origin)/RefLength;
2155 
2156  /*--- Modification to run at a fixed CL value ---*/
2157 
2158  if (Fixed_CL) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += dCMy_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] -= 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] -= dCMy_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha); }
2159 
2160  }
2161  break;
2162  case MOMENT_Z_COEFFICIENT :
2163  if (nDim == 2) {
2164 
2165  ForceProj_Vector[0] += -Weight_ObjFunc*(y - y_origin)/RefLength;
2166  ForceProj_Vector[1] += Weight_ObjFunc*(x - x_origin)/RefLength;
2167 
2168  /*--- Modification to run at a fixed CL and CM value ---*/
2169 
2170  if (Fixed_CL) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += dCMz_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] -= dCMz_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha); }
2171 
2172  }
2173  if (nDim == 3) {
2174 
2175  ForceProj_Vector[0] += -Weight_ObjFunc*(y - y_origin)/RefLength;
2176  ForceProj_Vector[1] += Weight_ObjFunc*(x - x_origin)/RefLength;
2177  ForceProj_Vector[2] += 0;
2178 
2179  /*--- Modification to run at a fixed CL value ---*/
2180 
2181  if (Fixed_CL) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += dCMz_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] -= 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] -= dCMz_dCL*Weight_ObjFunc*cos(Alpha); }
2182 
2183  }
2184  break;
2185  case EFFICIENCY :
2186  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += -Weight_ObjFunc*(invCD*sin(Alpha)+CLCD2*cos(Alpha)); ForceProj_Vector[1] += Weight_ObjFunc*(invCD*cos(Alpha)-CLCD2*sin(Alpha)); }
2187  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += -Weight_ObjFunc*(invCD*sin(Alpha)+CLCD2*cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta)); ForceProj_Vector[1] += -Weight_ObjFunc*CLCD2*sin(Beta); ForceProj_Vector[2] += Weight_ObjFunc*(invCD*cos(Alpha)-CLCD2*sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta)); }
2188  break;
2189  case EQUIVALENT_AREA :
2190  WDrag = Weight_ObjFunc*config->GetWeightCd();
2191  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Alpha)*WDrag; }
2192  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Beta)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[2] = sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*WDrag; }
2193  break;
2194  case NEARFIELD_PRESSURE :
2195  WDrag = Weight_ObjFunc*config->GetWeightCd();
2196  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Alpha)*WDrag; }
2197  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Beta)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[2] = sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*WDrag; }
2198  break;
2199  case FORCE_X_COEFFICIENT :
2200  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += Weight_ObjFunc*1.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] += 0.0; }
2201  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += Weight_ObjFunc*1.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] += 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] += 0.0; }
2202  break;
2203  case FORCE_Y_COEFFICIENT :
2204  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] += Weight_ObjFunc*1.0; }
2205  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] += Weight_ObjFunc*1.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] += 0.0; }
2206  break;
2207  case FORCE_Z_COEFFICIENT :
2208  if (nDim == 2) { SU2_MPI::Error("This functional is not possible in 2D!!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);}
2209  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] += 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] += Weight_ObjFunc*1.0; }
2210  break;
2211  case THRUST_COEFFICIENT :
2212  if (nDim == 2) { SU2_MPI::Error("This functional is not possible in 2D!!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);}
2213  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] += 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] += Weight_ObjFunc*1.0; }
2214  break;
2215  case TORQUE_COEFFICIENT :
2216  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += Weight_ObjFunc*(y - y_origin)/RefLength; ForceProj_Vector[1] += -Weight_ObjFunc*(x - x_origin)/RefLength; }
2217  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] += Weight_ObjFunc*(y - y_origin)/RefLength; ForceProj_Vector[1] += -Weight_ObjFunc*(x - x_origin)/RefLength; ForceProj_Vector[2] += 0; }
2218  break;
2219  case FIGURE_OF_MERIT :
2220  if (nDim == 2) { SU2_MPI::Error("This functional is not possible in 2D!!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);}
2221  if (nDim == 3) {
2222  ForceProj_Vector[0] += -Weight_ObjFunc*invCQ;
2223  ForceProj_Vector[1] += -Weight_ObjFunc*CTRCQ2*(z - z_origin);
2224  ForceProj_Vector[2] += Weight_ObjFunc*CTRCQ2*(y - y_origin);
2225  }
2226  break;
2227 
2228  default :
2229  break;
2230  }
2231 
2232  /*--- Store the force projection vector at this node ---*/
2233 
2234  node[iPoint]->SetForceProj_Vector(ForceProj_Vector);
2235 
2236  }
2237  }
2238  }
2239  delete [] ForceProj_Vector;
2240 
2241 }
2242 
2243 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetIntBoundary_Jump(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
2244  unsigned short iMarker, iVar, jVar, kVar, iDim, jDim, iIndex;
2245  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, iPointNearField, nPointNearField = 0;
2246  su2double factor = 1.0, AngleDouble, data, aux, *IntBound_Vector, *coord, *FlowSolution, WeightSB, MinDist = 1E6, Dist, DerivativeOF = 0.0, *Normal, Area, UnitNormal[3], velocity[3], Energy, Rho, sqvel, proj_vel, phi, a1, a2;
2247  su2double **A, **M, **AM, *b;
2248  short AngleInt = 0, IndexNF_inv[180], iColumn;
2249  ifstream index_file;
2250  string text_line;
2251  vector<vector<su2double> > NearFieldWeight;
2252  vector<su2double> CoordNF;
2253  vector<short> IndexNF;
2254 
2255  IntBound_Vector = new su2double [nVar];
2256 
2257  /*--- Allocate vectors and matrices ---*/
2258 
2259  b = new su2double [nVar];
2260  A = new su2double* [nVar];
2261  M = new su2double* [nVar];
2262  AM = new su2double* [nVar];
2263  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2264  A[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
2265  M[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
2266  AM[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
2267  }
2268 
2269  /*--- If equivalent area objective function, read the value of
2270  the derivative from a file, this is a preprocess of the direct solution ---*/
2271 
2272  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == EQUIVALENT_AREA) {
2273 
2274  /*--- Read derivative of the objective function at the NearField from file ---*/
2275  index_file.open("WeightNF.dat", ios::in);
2276  if (index_file.fail()) {
2277  SU2_MPI::Error("There is no Weight Nearfield Pressure file (WeightNF.dat).", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2278  }
2279 
2280  nPointNearField = 0;
2281 
2282  while (index_file) {
2283  string line;
2284  getline(index_file, line);
2285  istringstream is(line);
2286 
2287  /*--- The first row provides the azimuthal angle ---*/
2288 
2289  if (nPointNearField == 0) {
2290  is >> data; // The first column is related with the coordinate
2291  while (is.good()) { is >> data; IndexNF.push_back(SU2_TYPE::Int(data)); }
2292  }
2293  else {
2294  is >> data; CoordNF.push_back(data); // The first column is the point coordinate
2295  vector<su2double> row;
2296  while (is.good()) { is >> data; row.push_back(data); }
2297  NearFieldWeight.push_back(row);
2298  }
2299  nPointNearField++;
2300  }
2301 
2302  /*--- Note tha the first row is the azimuthal angle ---*/
2303 
2304  nPointNearField = nPointNearField - 1;
2305 
2306  for (AngleInt = 0; AngleInt < 180; AngleInt++)
2307  IndexNF_inv[AngleInt] = -1;
2308 
2309  if (IndexNF.size() <= 180) {
2310  for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < IndexNF.size(); iIndex++)
2311  IndexNF_inv[IndexNF[iIndex]] = iIndex;
2312  }
2313  else {
2314  SU2_MPI::Error("", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2315  }
2316 
2317  }
2318 
2319  /*--- Compute the jump on the adjoint variables for the upper and the lower side ---*/
2320 
2321  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
2322 
2323  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY)
2324 
2325  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2326 
2327  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2328  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2329 
2330  Area = 0.0;
2331  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
2332  Area = sqrt (Area);
2333 
2334  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2335  UnitNormal[iDim] = Normal[iDim]/Area;
2336 
2337  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2338 
2339  coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2340  DerivativeOF = 0.0;
2341 
2342  /*--- Just in case the functional depend also on the surface pressure ---*/
2343 
2344  WeightSB = 1.0-config->GetWeightCd();
2345 
2346  su2double AoA, XcoordRot = 0.0, YcoordRot = 0.0, ZcoordRot = 0.0;
2347 
2348  if (nDim == 2) XcoordRot = coord[0];
2349  if (nDim == 3) {
2350 
2351  /*--- Rotate the nearfield cylinder ---*/
2352 
2353  AoA = -(config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
2354  XcoordRot = coord[0]*cos(AoA) - coord[2]*sin(AoA);
2355  YcoordRot = coord[1];
2356  ZcoordRot = coord[0]*sin(AoA) + coord[2]*cos(AoA);
2357  }
2358 
2359  switch (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()) {
2360  case EQUIVALENT_AREA :
2361 
2362  if (nDim == 2) AngleInt = 0;
2363 
2364  if (nDim == 3) {
2365 
2366  /*--- Compute the azimuthal angle of the iPoint ---*/
2367 
2368  AngleDouble = fabs(atan(-YcoordRot/ZcoordRot)*180.0/PI_NUMBER);
2369 
2370  /*--- Fix an azimuthal line due to misalignments of the near-field ---*/
2371 
2372  su2double FixAzimuthalLine = config->GetFixAzimuthalLine();
2373 
2374  if ((AngleDouble >= FixAzimuthalLine - 0.1) && (AngleDouble <= FixAzimuthalLine + 0.1)) AngleDouble = FixAzimuthalLine - 0.1;
2375 
2376  AngleInt = SU2_TYPE::Short(floor(AngleDouble + 0.5));
2377  if (AngleInt < 0) AngleInt = 180 + AngleInt;
2378 
2379  }
2380 
2381  if (AngleInt <= 60) {
2382  iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt];
2383 
2384  /*--- An azimuthal angle is not defined... this happens with MG levels ---*/
2385 
2386  if (iColumn < 0.0) {
2387  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+1] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+1]; goto end; }
2388  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-1] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-1]; goto end; }
2389  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+2] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+2]; goto end; }
2390  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-2] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-2]; goto end; }
2391  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+3] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+3]; goto end; }
2392  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-3] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-3]; goto end; }
2393  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+4] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+4]; goto end; }
2394  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-4] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-4]; goto end; }
2395  }
2396 
2397  end:
2398 
2399  if (iColumn < 0.0) { cout <<" An azimuthal angle is not defined..." << endl; }
2400 
2401  /*--- Find the value of the weight in the table, using the azimuthal angle ---*/
2402 
2403  MinDist = 1E6;
2404  for (iPointNearField = 0; iPointNearField < nPointNearField; iPointNearField++) {
2405  Dist = fabs(CoordNF[iPointNearField] - XcoordRot);
2406  if (Dist <= MinDist) {
2407  MinDist = Dist;
2408  DerivativeOF = factor*WeightSB*NearFieldWeight[iPointNearField][iColumn];
2409  }
2410  }
2411  }
2412  else DerivativeOF = 0.0;
2413 
2414  if ((MinDist > 1E-6) || (coord[nDim-1] > 0.0)) DerivativeOF = 0.0;
2415 
2416  break;
2417 
2418  case NEARFIELD_PRESSURE :
2419 
2420  DerivativeOF = factor*WeightSB*(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPressure()
2421  - solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetPressure_Inf());
2422 
2423  break;
2424 
2425  }
2426 
2427  /*--- Compute the jump of the adjoint variables (2D, and 3D problems) --*/
2428 
2429  FlowSolution = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
2430 
2431  Rho = FlowSolution[0];
2432  Energy = FlowSolution[nVar-1]/FlowSolution[0];
2433 
2434  sqvel = 0.0; proj_vel = 0.0;
2435  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2436  velocity[iDim] = FlowSolution[iDim+1]/FlowSolution[0];
2437  sqvel += velocity[iDim]*velocity[iDim];
2438  proj_vel += velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
2439  }
2440 
2441  if (nDim == 2) {
2442 
2443  /*--- Compute the projected Jacobian ---*/
2444 
2445  A[0][0] = 0.0; A[0][1] = 0.0; A[0][2] = 1.0; A[0][3] = 0.0;
2446  A[1][0] = -velocity[0]*velocity[1]; A[1][1] = velocity[1]; A[1][2] = velocity[0]; A[1][3] = 0.0;
2447  A[2][0] = 0.5*(Gamma-3.0)*velocity[1]*velocity[1]+0.5*Gamma_Minus_One*velocity[0]*velocity[0]; A[2][1] = -Gamma_Minus_One*velocity[0];
2448  A[2][2] = (3.0-Gamma)*velocity[1]; A[2][3] = Gamma_Minus_One; A[3][0] = -Gamma*velocity[1]*Energy+Gamma_Minus_One*velocity[1]*sqvel;
2449  A[3][1] = -Gamma_Minus_One*velocity[0]*velocity[1]; A[3][2] = Gamma*Energy-0.5*Gamma_Minus_One*(velocity[0]*velocity[0]+3.0*velocity[1]*velocity[1]); A[3][3] = Gamma*velocity[1];
2450 
2451  /*--- Compute the transformation matrix ---*/
2452 
2453  M[0][0] = 1.0; M[0][1] = 0.0; M[0][2] = 0.0; M[0][3] = 0.0;
2454  M[1][0] = velocity[0]; M[1][1] = Rho; M[1][2] = 0.0; M[1][3] = 0.0;
2455  M[2][0] = velocity[1]; M[2][1] = 0.0; M[2][2] = Rho; M[2][3] = 0.0;
2456  M[3][0] = 0.5*sqvel; M[3][1] = Rho*velocity[0]; M[3][2] = Rho*velocity[1]; M[3][3] = 1.0/Gamma_Minus_One;
2457 
2458  /*--- Create the soruce term (AM)^T X = b ---*/
2459 
2460  b[0] = 0.0; b[1] = 0.0; b[2] = 0.0; b[3] = DerivativeOF;
2461 
2462  }
2463 
2464  if (nDim == 3) {
2465 
2466 
2467  /*--- Compute the projected Jacobian ---*/
2468 
2469  phi = 0.5*Gamma_Minus_One*sqvel;
2470  a1 = Gamma*Energy-phi; a2 = Gamma-1.0;
2471 
2472  A[0][0] = 0.0;
2473  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) A[0][iDim+1] = UnitNormal[iDim];
2474  A[0][nDim+1] = 0.0;
2475 
2476  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2477  A[iDim+1][0] = (UnitNormal[iDim]*phi - velocity[iDim]*proj_vel);
2478  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
2479  A[iDim+1][jDim+1] = (UnitNormal[jDim]*velocity[iDim]-a2*UnitNormal[iDim]*velocity[jDim]);
2480  A[iDim+1][iDim+1] += proj_vel;
2481  A[iDim+1][nDim+1] = a2*UnitNormal[iDim];
2482  }
2483 
2484  A[nDim+1][0] = proj_vel*(phi-a1);
2485  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2486  A[nDim+1][iDim+1] = (UnitNormal[iDim]*a1-a2*velocity[iDim]*proj_vel);
2487  A[nDim+1][nDim+1] = Gamma*proj_vel;
2488 
2489  /*--- Compute the transformation matrix ---*/
2490 
2491  M[0][0] = 1.0; M[0][1] = 0.0; M[0][2] = 0.0; M[0][3] = 0.0; M[0][4] = 0.0;
2492  M[1][0] = velocity[0]; M[1][1] = Rho; M[1][2] = 0.0; M[1][3] = 0.0; M[1][4] = 0.0;
2493  M[2][0] = velocity[1]; M[2][1] = 0.0; M[2][2] = Rho; M[2][3] = 0.0; M[2][4] = 0.0;
2494  M[3][0] = velocity[2]; M[3][1] = 0.0; M[3][2] = 0.0; M[3][3] = Rho; M[3][4] = 0.0;
2495  M[4][0] = 0.5*sqvel; M[4][1] = Rho*velocity[0]; M[4][2] = Rho*velocity[1];
2496  M[4][3] = Rho*velocity[2]; M[4][4] = 1.0/Gamma_Minus_One;
2497 
2498  /*--- Create the soruce term (AM)^T X = b ---*/
2499 
2500  b[0] = 0.0; b[1] = 0.0; b[2] = 0.0; b[3] = 0.0; b[4] = DerivativeOF;
2501 
2502  }
2503 
2504  /*--- Compute A times M ---*/
2505 
2506  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2507  for (jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar++) {
2508  aux = 0.0;
2509  for (kVar = 0; kVar < nVar; kVar++)
2510  aux += A[iVar][kVar]*M[kVar][jVar];
2511  AM[iVar][jVar] = aux;
2512  }
2513 
2514  /*--- Compute the transpose matrix ---*/
2515 
2516  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2517  for (jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar++)
2518  A[iVar][jVar] = AM[jVar][iVar];
2519 
2520  /*--- Solve the linear system using a LU descomposition --*/
2521 
2522  Gauss_Elimination(A, b, nVar);
2523 
2524  /*--- Update the internal boundary jump --*/
2525 
2526  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2527  IntBound_Vector[iVar] = b[iVar];
2528 
2529  node[iPoint]->SetIntBoundary_Jump(IntBound_Vector);
2530 
2531  }
2532  }
2533 
2534  delete [] IntBound_Vector;
2535 
2536  /*--- Deallocate the linear system ---*/
2537 
2538  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2539  delete [] A[iVar];
2540  delete [] M[iVar];
2541  delete [] AM[iVar];
2542  }
2543  delete [] A;
2544  delete [] M;
2545  delete [] AM;
2546  delete [] b;
2547 
2548 }
2549 
2550 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetInitialCondition(CGeometry **geometry, CSolver ***solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned long ExtIter) {
2551  unsigned long iPoint, Point_Fine;
2552  unsigned short iMesh, iChildren, iVar;
2553  su2double Area_Children, Area_Parent, *Solution, *Solution_Fine;
2554 
2555  bool restart = config->GetRestart();
2556  bool dual_time = ((config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_1ST) ||
2557  (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_2ND));
2558 
2559  /*--- If restart solution, then interpolate the flow solution to
2560  all the multigrid levels, this is important with the dual time strategy ---*/
2561  if (restart) {
2562  Solution = new su2double[nVar];
2563  for (iMesh = 1; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
2564  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry[iMesh]->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
2565  Area_Parent = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
2566  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution[iVar] = 0.0;
2567  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++) {
2568  Point_Fine = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
2569  Area_Children = geometry[iMesh-1]->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
2570  Solution_Fine = solver_container[iMesh-1][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[Point_Fine]->GetSolution();
2571  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2572  Solution[iVar] += Solution_Fine[iVar]*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
2573  }
2574  }
2575  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->SetSolution(Solution);
2576 
2577  }
2578  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->Set_MPI_Solution(geometry[iMesh], config);
2579  }
2580  delete [] Solution;
2581  }
2582 
2583  /*--- The value of the solution for the first iteration of the dual time ---*/
2584  for (iMesh = 0; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
2585  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry[iMesh]->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
2586  if ((ExtIter == 0) && (dual_time)) {
2587  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->Set_Solution_time_n();
2588  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->Set_Solution_time_n1();
2589  }
2590  }
2591  }
2592 
2593 }
2594 
2595 void CAdjEulerSolver::Preprocessing(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short iRKStep, unsigned short RunTime_EqSystem, bool Output) {
2596 
2597  unsigned long iPoint, ErrorCounter = 0;
2598  su2double SharpEdge_Distance;
2599  bool RightSol = true;
2600 
2601  /*--- Retrieve information about the spatial and temporal integration for the
2602  adjoint equations (note that the flow problem may use different methods). ---*/
2603 
2604  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
2605  bool muscl = config->GetMUSCL_AdjFlow();
2606  bool limiter = (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_AdjFlow() != NO_LIMITER);
2607  bool center = (config->GetKind_ConvNumScheme_AdjFlow() == SPACE_CENTERED);
2608  bool center_jst = (config->GetKind_Centered_AdjFlow() == JST);
2609  bool fixed_cl = config->GetFixed_CL_Mode();
2610  bool eval_dof_dcx = config->GetEval_dOF_dCX();
2611 
2612  /*--- Update the objective function coefficient to guarantee zero gradient. ---*/
2613 
2614  if (fixed_cl && eval_dof_dcx) { SetFarfield_AoA(geometry, solver_container, config, iMesh, Output); }
2615 
2616  /*--- Residual initialization ---*/
2617 
2618  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint ++) {
2619 
2620  /*--- Get the distance form a sharp edge ---*/
2621 
2622  SharpEdge_Distance = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance();
2623 
2624  /*--- Initialize the non-physical points vector ---*/
2625 
2626  node[iPoint]->SetNon_Physical(false);
2627 
2628  /*--- Set the primitive variables compressible
2629  adjoint variables ---*/
2630 
2631  RightSol = node[iPoint]->SetPrimVar(SharpEdge_Distance, false, config);
2632  if (!RightSol) { node[iPoint]->SetNon_Physical(true); ErrorCounter++; }
2633 
2634  /*--- Initialize the convective residual vector ---*/
2635 
2636  if (!Output) LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint);
2637 
2638  }
2639 
2640 
2641  if ((muscl) && (iMesh == MESH_0)) {
2642 
2643  /*--- Compute gradients for upwind second-order reconstruction ---*/
2644 
2645  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == GREEN_GAUSS) SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config);
2646  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config);
2647 
2648  /*--- Limiter computation ---*/
2649 
2650  if (limiter && !Output) SetSolution_Limiter(geometry, config);
2651 
2652  }
2653 
2654  /*--- Artificial dissipation for centered schemes ---*/
2655 
2656  if (center) {
2657  if ((center_jst) && (iMesh == MESH_0)) {
2658  SetCentered_Dissipation_Sensor(geometry, config);
2659  SetUndivided_Laplacian(geometry, config);
2660  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == GREEN_GAUSS) SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config);
2661  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config);
2662  }
2663  }
2664 
2665  /*--- Initialize the Jacobian for implicit integration ---*/
2666 
2667  if (implicit) Jacobian.SetValZero();
2668 
2669  /*--- Error message ---*/
2670 
2671  if (config->GetConsole_Output_Verb() == VERB_HIGH) {
2672 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
2673  unsigned long MyErrorCounter = ErrorCounter; ErrorCounter = 0;
2674  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyErrorCounter, &ErrorCounter, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2675 #endif
2676  if (iMesh == MESH_0) config->SetNonphysical_Points(ErrorCounter);
2677  }
2678 
2679 }
2680 
2681 void CAdjEulerSolver::Centered_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
2682  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short iRKStep) {
2683 
2684  unsigned long iEdge, iPoint, jPoint;
2685 
2686  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
2687  bool jst_scheme = ((config->GetKind_Centered_AdjFlow() == JST) && (iMesh == MESH_0));
2688  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
2689 
2690  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
2691 
2692  /*--- Points in edge, normal, and neighbors---*/
2693 
2694  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
2695  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
2696  numerics->SetNormal(geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal());
2697  numerics->SetNeighbor(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnNeighbor(), geometry->node[jPoint]->GetnNeighbor());
2698 
2699  /*--- Adjoint variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
2700 
2701  numerics->SetAdjointVar(node[iPoint]->GetSolution(), node[jPoint]->GetSolution());
2702 
2703  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
2704 
2705  numerics->SetConservative(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution(),
2706  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetSolution());
2707 
2708  numerics->SetSoundSpeed(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSoundSpeed(),
2709  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetSoundSpeed());
2710  numerics->SetEnthalpy(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy(),
2711  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetEnthalpy());
2712 
2713 
2714  numerics->SetLambda(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetLambda(),
2715  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetLambda());
2716 
2717  if (jst_scheme) {
2718  numerics->SetUndivided_Laplacian(node[iPoint]->GetUndivided_Laplacian(), node[jPoint]->GetUndivided_Laplacian());
2719  numerics->SetSensor(node[iPoint]->GetSensor(), node[jPoint]->GetSensor());
2720  }
2721 
2722  /*--- Mesh motion ---*/
2723 
2724  if (grid_movement) {
2725  numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGridVel());
2726  }
2727 
2728  /*--- Compute residuals ---*/
2729 
2730  numerics->ComputeResidual(Res_Conv_i, Res_Visc_i, Res_Conv_j, Res_Visc_j,
2731  Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
2732 
2733  /*--- Update convective and artificial dissipation residuals ---*/
2734 
2735  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
2736  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(jPoint, Res_Conv_j);
2737  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Visc_i);
2738  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(jPoint, Res_Visc_j);
2739 
2740  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
2741 
2742  if (implicit) {
2743  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
2744  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_ij);
2745  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ji);
2746  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_jj);
2747  }
2748 
2749  }
2750 }
2751 
2752 
2753 void CAdjEulerSolver::Upwind_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
2754 
2755  su2double **Gradient_i, **Gradient_j, Project_Grad_i, Project_Grad_j, *Limiter_i = NULL,
2756  *Limiter_j = NULL, *Psi_i = NULL, *Psi_j = NULL, *V_i, *V_j, Non_Physical = 1.0;
2757  unsigned long iEdge, iPoint, jPoint;
2758  unsigned short iDim, iVar;
2759 
2760  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
2761  bool muscl = (config->GetMUSCL_AdjFlow() && (iMesh == MESH_0));
2762  bool limiter = (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_AdjFlow() != NO_LIMITER);
2763  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
2764 
2765  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
2766 
2767  /*--- Points in edge and normal vectors ---*/
2768 
2769  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
2770  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
2771  numerics->SetNormal(geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal());
2772 
2773  /*--- Adjoint variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
2774 
2775  Psi_i = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
2776  Psi_j = node[jPoint]->GetSolution();
2777  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_i, Psi_j);
2778 
2779  /*--- Primitive variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
2780 
2781  V_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
2782  V_j = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetPrimitive();
2783  numerics->SetPrimitive(V_i, V_j);
2784 
2785  /*--- Grid velocities for dynamic meshes ---*/
2786 
2787  if (grid_movement) {
2788  numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGridVel());
2789  }
2790 
2791  /*--- High order reconstruction using MUSCL strategy ---*/
2792 
2793  if (muscl) {
2794 
2795  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2796  Vector_i[iDim] = 0.5*(geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim));
2797  Vector_j[iDim] = 0.5*(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim));
2798  }
2799 
2800  /*--- Adjoint variables using gradient reconstruction and limiters ---*/
2801 
2802  Gradient_i = node[iPoint]->GetGradient(); Gradient_j = node[jPoint]->GetGradient();
2803  if (limiter) { Limiter_i = node[iPoint]->GetLimiter(); Limiter_j = node[jPoint]->GetLimiter(); }
2804 
2805  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2806  Project_Grad_i = 0; Project_Grad_j = 0;
2807  Non_Physical = node[iPoint]->GetNon_Physical()*node[jPoint]->GetNon_Physical();
2808  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2809  Project_Grad_i += Vector_i[iDim]*Gradient_i[iVar][iDim]*Non_Physical;
2810  Project_Grad_j += Vector_j[iDim]*Gradient_j[iVar][iDim]*Non_Physical;
2811  }
2812  if (limiter) {
2813  Solution_i[iVar] = Psi_i[iVar] + Project_Grad_i*Limiter_i[iDim];
2814  Solution_j[iVar] = Psi_j[iVar] + Project_Grad_j*Limiter_j[iDim];
2815  }
2816  else {
2817  Solution_i[iVar] = Psi_i[iVar] + Project_Grad_i;
2818  Solution_j[iVar] = Psi_j[iVar] + Project_Grad_j;
2819  }
2820  }
2821 
2822  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2823 
2824  }
2825 
2826  /*--- Compute the residual---*/
2827 
2828  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
2829 
2830  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
2831 
2832  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
2833  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(jPoint, Residual_j);
2834 
2835  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
2836 
2837  if (implicit) {
2838  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
2839  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_ij);
2840  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ji);
2841  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_jj);
2842  }
2843 
2844  }
2845 
2846 }
2847 
2848 void CAdjEulerSolver::Source_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CNumerics *second_numerics,
2849  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
2850 
2851  unsigned short iVar;
2852  unsigned long iPoint;
2853  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
2854  bool rotating_frame = config->GetRotating_Frame();
2855  bool axisymmetric = config->GetAxisymmetric();
2856  // bool gravity = (config->GetGravityForce() == YES);
2857  bool harmonic_balance = (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == HARMONIC_BALANCE);
2858 
2859  /*--- Initialize the source residual to zero ---*/
2860  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2861 
2862  if (rotating_frame) {
2863 
2864  /*--- Loop over all points ---*/
2865  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
2866 
2867  /*--- Load the adjoint variables ---*/
2868  numerics->SetAdjointVar(node[iPoint]->GetSolution(),
2869  node[iPoint]->GetSolution());
2870 
2871  /*--- Load the volume of the dual mesh cell ---*/
2872  numerics->SetVolume(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume());
2873 
2874  /*--- Compute the adjoint rotating frame source residual ---*/
2875  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, config);
2876 
2877  /*--- Add the source residual to the total ---*/
2878  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2879 
2880  /*--- Add the implicit Jacobian contribution ---*/
2881  if (implicit) Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
2882 
2883  }
2884  }
2885 
2886  if (harmonic_balance) {
2887 
2888  su2double Volume, Source;
2889 
2890  /*--- loop over points ---*/
2891  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
2892 
2893  /*--- Get control volume ---*/
2894  Volume = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
2895 
2896  /*--- Get stored harmonic balance source term ---*/
2897  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2898  Source = node[iPoint]->GetHarmonicBalance_Source(iVar);
2899  Residual[iVar] = Source*Volume;
2900  }
2901 
2902  /*--- Add Residual ---*/
2903  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2904 
2905  }
2906  }
2907 
2908  if (axisymmetric) {
2909 
2910  /*--- Zero out Jacobian structure ---*/
2911  if (implicit) {
2912  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar ++)
2913  for (unsigned short jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar ++)
2914  Jacobian_i[iVar][jVar] = 0.0;
2915  }
2916 
2917  /*--- loop over points ---*/
2918  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
2919 
2920  /*--- Set solution ---*/
2921  numerics->SetConservative(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution(), solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution());
2922 
2923  /*--- Set adjoint variables ---*/
2924  numerics->SetAdjointVar(node[iPoint]->GetSolution(), node[iPoint]->GetSolution());
2925 
2926  /*--- Set control volume ---*/
2927  numerics->SetVolume(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume());
2928 
2929  /*--- Set coordinate ---*/
2930  numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
2931 
2932  /*--- Compute Source term Residual ---*/
2933  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, config);
2934 
2935  /*--- Add Residual ---*/
2936  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2937 
2938  /*--- Implicit part ---*/
2939  if (implicit)
2940  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
2941 
2942  }
2943  }
2944 
2945  // if (gravity) {
2946  //
2947  // }
2948 
2949 }
2950 
2951 void CAdjEulerSolver::Source_Template(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
2952  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
2953 }
2954 
2955 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetUndivided_Laplacian(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
2956  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iEdge;
2957  unsigned short iVar;
2958  su2double *Diff;
2959 
2960  Diff = new su2double[nVar];
2961 
2962  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++)
2963  node[iPoint]->SetUnd_LaplZero();
2964 
2965  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
2966  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
2967  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
2968 
2969  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2970  Diff[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar) - node[jPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
2971 
2972 #ifdef STRUCTURED_GRID
2973 
2974  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) node[iPoint]->SubtractUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2975  if (geometry->node[jPoint]->GetDomain()) node[jPoint]->AddUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2976 
2977 #else
2978 
2979  bool boundary_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPhysicalBoundary();
2980  bool boundary_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetPhysicalBoundary();
2981 
2982  /*--- Both points inside the domain, or both in the boundary ---*/
2983  if ((!boundary_i && !boundary_j) || (boundary_i && boundary_j)) {
2984  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) node[iPoint]->SubtractUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2985  if (geometry->node[jPoint]->GetDomain()) node[jPoint]->AddUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2986  }
2987 
2988  /*--- iPoint inside the domain, jPoint on the boundary ---*/
2989  if (!boundary_i && boundary_j)
2990  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) node[iPoint]->SubtractUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2991 
2992  /*--- jPoint inside the domain, iPoint on the boundary ---*/
2993  if (boundary_i && !boundary_j)
2994  if (geometry->node[jPoint]->GetDomain()) node[jPoint]->AddUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2995 
2996 #endif
2997 
2998  }
2999 
3000 #ifdef STRUCTURED_GRID
3001 
3002  unsigned long Point_Normal = 0, iVertex;
3003  unsigned short iMarker;
3004  su2double *Psi_mirror;
3005 
3006  Psi_mirror = new su2double[nVar];
3007 
3008  /*--- Loop over all boundaries and include an extra contribution
3009  from a halo node. Find the nearest normal, interior point
3010  for a boundary node and make a linear approximation. ---*/
3011  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3012 
3013  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
3014  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERFACE_BOUNDARY &&
3015  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
3016  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) {
3017 
3018  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3019  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3020 
3021  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3022 
3023  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
3024 
3025  /*--- Interpolate & compute difference in the conserved variables ---*/
3026 
3027  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3028  Psi_mirror[iVar] = 2.0*node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar) - node[Point_Normal]->GetSolution(iVar);
3029  Diff[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar) - Psi_mirror[iVar];
3030  }
3031 
3032  /*--- Subtract contribution at the boundary node only ---*/
3033 
3034  node[iPoint]->SubtractUnd_Lapl(Diff);
3035  }
3036  }
3037  }
3038  }
3039 
3040  delete [] Psi_mirror;
3041 
3042 #endif
3043 
3044  delete [] Diff;
3045 
3046  /*--- MPI parallelization ---*/
3047 
3048  Set_MPI_Undivided_Laplacian(geometry, config);
3049 
3050 }
3051 
3052 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetCentered_Dissipation_Sensor(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
3053 
3054  unsigned long iPoint;
3055  su2double SharpEdge_Distance, eps, ds, scale, Sensor, Param_Kappa_2, Param_Kappa_4;
3056 
3057  eps = config->GetVenkat_LimiterCoeff()*config->GetRefElemLength();
3058  Param_Kappa_2 = config->GetKappa_2nd_AdjFlow();
3059  Param_Kappa_4 = config->GetKappa_4th_AdjFlow();
3060 
3061  if (Param_Kappa_2 != 0.0) scale = 2.0 * Param_Kappa_4 / Param_Kappa_2;
3062  else scale = 0.0;
3063 
3064  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3065 
3066  SharpEdge_Distance = (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance() - config->GetAdjSharp_LimiterCoeff()*eps);
3067 
3068  ds = 0.0;
3069  if (SharpEdge_Distance < -eps) ds = 1.0;
3070  if (fabs(SharpEdge_Distance) <= eps) ds = 1.0 - (0.5*(1.0+(SharpEdge_Distance/eps)+(1.0/PI_NUMBER)*sin(PI_NUMBER*SharpEdge_Distance/eps)));
3071  if (SharpEdge_Distance > eps) ds = 0.0;
3072 
3073  Sensor = scale * ds;
3074 
3075  node[iPoint]->SetSensor(Sensor);
3076 
3077  }
3078 
3079  /*--- MPI parallelization ---*/
3080  Set_MPI_Sensor(geometry, config);
3081 
3082 }
3083 
3084 void CAdjEulerSolver::ExplicitRK_Iteration(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container,
3085  CConfig *config, unsigned short iRKStep) {
3086  su2double *Residual, *Res_TruncError, Vol, Delta, Res;
3087  unsigned short iVar;
3088  unsigned long iPoint;
3089 
3090  su2double RK_AlphaCoeff = config->Get_Alpha_RKStep(iRKStep);
3091 
3092  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3093  SetRes_RMS(iVar, 0.0);
3094  SetRes_Max(iVar, 0.0, 0);
3095  }
3096 
3097  /*--- Update the solution ---*/
3098  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
3099  Vol = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
3100  Delta = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDelta_Time() / Vol;
3101 
3102  Res_TruncError = node[iPoint]->GetResTruncError();
3103  Residual = LinSysRes.GetBlock(iPoint);
3104 
3105  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3106  Res = Residual[iVar] + Res_TruncError[iVar];
3107  node[iPoint]->AddSolution(iVar, -Res*Delta*RK_AlphaCoeff);
3108  AddRes_RMS(iVar, Res*Res);
3109  AddRes_Max(iVar, fabs(Res), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
3110  }
3111 
3112  }
3113 
3114  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
3115  Set_MPI_Solution(geometry, config);
3116 
3117  /*--- Compute the root mean square residual ---*/
3118  SetResidual_RMS(geometry, config);
3119 
3120 }
3121 
3122 void CAdjEulerSolver::ExplicitEuler_Iteration(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
3123  su2double *local_Residual, *local_Res_TruncError, Vol, Delta, Res;
3124  unsigned short iVar;
3125  unsigned long iPoint;
3126 
3127  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3128  SetRes_RMS(iVar, 0.0);
3129  SetRes_Max(iVar, 0.0, 0);
3130  }
3131 
3132  /*--- Update the solution ---*/
3133  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
3134  Vol = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
3135  Delta = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDelta_Time() / Vol;
3136 
3137  local_Res_TruncError = node[iPoint]->GetResTruncError();
3138  local_Residual = LinSysRes.GetBlock(iPoint);
3139 
3140  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3141  Res = local_Residual[iVar] + local_Res_TruncError[iVar];
3142  node[iPoint]->AddSolution(iVar, -Res*Delta);
3143  AddRes_RMS(iVar, Res*Res);
3144  AddRes_Max(iVar, fabs(Res), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
3145  }
3146 
3147  }
3148 
3149  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
3150  Set_MPI_Solution(geometry, config);
3151 
3152  /*--- Compute the root mean square residual ---*/
3153  SetResidual_RMS(geometry, config);
3154 
3155 }
3156 
3157 void CAdjEulerSolver::ImplicitEuler_Iteration(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
3158 
3159  unsigned short iVar;
3160  unsigned long iPoint, total_index;
3161  su2double Delta, *local_Res_TruncError, Vol;
3162 
3163  /*--- Set maximum residual to zero ---*/
3164 
3165  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3166  SetRes_RMS(iVar, 0.0);
3167  SetRes_Max(iVar, 0.0, 0);
3168  }
3169 
3170  /*--- Build implicit system ---*/
3171 
3172  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
3173 
3174  /*--- Read the residual ---*/
3175 
3176  local_Res_TruncError = node[iPoint]->GetResTruncError();
3177 
3178  /*--- Read the volume ---*/
3179 
3180  Vol = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
3181 
3182  /*--- Modify matrix diagonal to assure diagonal dominance ---*/
3183 
3184  if (solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDelta_Time() != 0.0) {
3185  Delta = Vol / solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDelta_Time();
3186  Jacobian.AddVal2Diag(iPoint, Delta);
3187  }
3188  else {
3189  Jacobian.SetVal2Diag(iPoint, 1.0);
3190  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3191  total_index = iPoint*nVar + iVar;
3192  LinSysRes[total_index] = 0.0;
3193  local_Res_TruncError[iVar] = 0.0;
3194  }
3195  }
3196 
3197  /*--- Right hand side of the system (-Residual) and initial guess (x = 0) ---*/
3198 
3199  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3200  total_index = iPoint*nVar+iVar;
3201  LinSysRes[total_index] = -(LinSysRes[total_index] + local_Res_TruncError[iVar]);
3202  LinSysSol[total_index] = 0.0;
3203  AddRes_RMS(iVar, LinSysRes[total_index]*LinSysRes[total_index]);
3204  AddRes_Max(iVar, fabs(LinSysRes[total_index]), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
3205  }
3206 
3207  }
3208 
3209  /*--- Initialize residual and solution at the ghost points ---*/
3210 
3211  for (iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3212  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3213  total_index = iPoint*nVar + iVar;
3214  LinSysRes[total_index] = 0.0;
3215  LinSysSol[total_index] = 0.0;
3216  }
3217  }
3218 
3219  /*--- Solve or smooth the linear system ---*/
3220 
3221  CSysSolve system;
3222  system.Solve(Jacobian, LinSysRes, LinSysSol, geometry, config);
3223 
3224  /*--- Update solution (system written in terms of increments) ---*/
3225 
3226  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++)
3227  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3228  node[iPoint]->AddSolution(iVar, config->GetRelaxation_Factor_AdjFlow()*LinSysSol[iPoint*nVar+iVar]);
3229  }
3230 
3231  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
3232 
3233  Set_MPI_Solution(geometry, config);
3234 
3235  /*--- Compute the root mean square residual ---*/
3236 
3237  SetResidual_RMS(geometry, config);
3238 
3239 }
3240 
3241 void CAdjEulerSolver::Inviscid_Sensitivity(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config) {
3242 
3243  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Neigh;
3244  unsigned short iPos, jPos;
3245  unsigned short iDim, iMarker, iNeigh;
3246  su2double *d = NULL, *Normal = NULL, *Psi = NULL, *U = NULL, Enthalpy, conspsi = 0.0, Mach_Inf,
3247  Area, **PrimVar_Grad = NULL, *ConsPsi_Grad = NULL,
3248  ConsPsi, d_press, grad_v, v_gradconspsi, UnitNormal[3], *GridVel = NULL,
3249  eps, r, ru, rv, rw, rE, p, T, dp_dr, dp_dru, dp_drv,
3250  dp_drw, dp_drE, dH_dr, dH_dru, dH_drv, dH_drw, dH_drE, H, *USens, D[3][3], Dd[3], scale = 1.0;
3251  su2double RefVel2, RefDensity, Mach2Vel, *Velocity_Inf, factor;
3252  su2double Vn, SoundSpeed, *Velocity;
3253 
3254  USens = new su2double[nVar];
3255  Velocity = new su2double[nDim];
3256 
3257  su2double Gas_Constant = config->GetGas_ConstantND();
3258  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
3259  su2double RefArea = config->GetRefArea();
3260  su2double Mach_Motion = config->GetMach_Motion();
3261  unsigned short ObjFunc = config->GetKind_ObjFunc();
3262 
3263  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) scale = 1.0/12.0;
3264  else scale = 1.0;
3265 
3266  /*--- Compute non-dimensional factor. For dynamic meshes, use the motion Mach
3267  number as a reference value for computing the force coefficients.
3268  Otherwise, use the freestream values,
3269  which is the standard convention. ---*/
3270 
3271  if (grid_movement) {
3272  Mach2Vel = sqrt(Gamma*Gas_Constant*config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND());
3273  RefVel2 = (Mach_Motion*Mach2Vel)*(Mach_Motion*Mach2Vel);
3274  }
3275  else {
3276  Velocity_Inf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
3277  RefVel2 = 0.0;
3278  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3279  RefVel2 += Velocity_Inf[iDim]*Velocity_Inf[iDim];
3280  }
3281 
3282  RefDensity = config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
3283 
3284  factor = 1.0;
3285  /*-- For multi-objective problems these scaling factors are applied before solution ---*/
3286  if (config->GetnObj()==1) {
3287  factor = 1.0/(0.5*RefDensity*RefArea*RefVel2);
3288  if ((ObjFunc == INVERSE_DESIGN_HEATFLUX) ||
3289  (ObjFunc == TOTAL_HEATFLUX) || (ObjFunc == MAXIMUM_HEATFLUX) ||
3290  (ObjFunc == SURFACE_MASSFLOW) )
3291  factor = 1.0;
3292 
3293  if ((ObjFunc == SURFACE_TOTAL_PRESSURE) || (ObjFunc == SURFACE_STATIC_PRESSURE)) factor = 1.0/Area_Monitored;
3294 
3295  }
3296 
3297  /*--- Initialize sensitivities to zero ---*/
3298 
3299  Total_Sens_Geo = 0.0;
3300  Total_Sens_Mach = 0.0;
3301  Total_Sens_AoA = 0.0;
3302  Total_Sens_Press = 0.0;
3303  Total_Sens_Temp = 0.0;
3304  Total_Sens_BPress = 0.0;
3305 
3306  /*--- Loop over boundary markers to select those for Euler walls ---*/
3307 
3308  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
3309 
3310  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL)
3311 
3312  /*--- Loop over points on the surface to store the auxiliary variable ---*/
3313 
3314  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3315  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3316  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3317  Psi = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3318  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3319  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy();
3320  conspsi = U[0]*Psi[0] + U[0]*Enthalpy*Psi[nDim+1];
3321  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) conspsi += U[iDim+1]*Psi[iDim+1];
3322 
3323  node[iPoint]->SetAuxVar(conspsi);
3324 
3325  /*--- Also load the auxiliary variable for first neighbors ---*/
3326 
3327  for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNeigh++) {
3328  Neigh = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
3329  Psi = node[Neigh]->GetSolution();
3330  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[Neigh]->GetSolution();
3331  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[Neigh]->GetEnthalpy();
3332  conspsi = U[0]*Psi[0] + U[0]*Enthalpy*Psi[nDim+1];
3333  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) conspsi += U[iDim+1]*Psi[iDim+1];
3334  node[Neigh]->SetAuxVar(conspsi);
3335  }
3336  }
3337  }
3338 
3339  /*--- Compute surface gradients of the auxiliary variable ---*/
3340 
3341  SetAuxVar_Surface_Gradient(geometry, config);
3342 
3343  /*--- Evaluate the shape sensitivity ---*/
3344 
3345  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3346  Sens_Geo[iMarker] = 0.0;
3347 
3348  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL) {
3349  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3350  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3351  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3352 
3353  d = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
3354  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3355  Area = 0;
3356  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3357  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3358  Area = sqrt(Area);
3359 
3360  PrimVar_Grad = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive();
3361  ConsPsi_Grad = node[iPoint]->GetAuxVarGradient();
3362  ConsPsi = node[iPoint]->GetAuxVar();
3363 
3364  d_press = 0.0; grad_v = 0.0; v_gradconspsi = 0.0;
3365  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3366 
3367  /*-- Retrieve the value of the pressure gradient ---*/
3368 
3369  d_press += d[iDim]*PrimVar_Grad[nDim+1][iDim];
3370 
3371  /*-- Retrieve the value of the velocity gradient ---*/
3372 
3373  grad_v += PrimVar_Grad[iDim+1][iDim]*ConsPsi;
3374 
3375  /*-- Retrieve the value of the theta gradient ---*/
3376 
3377  v_gradconspsi += solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetVelocity(iDim) * ConsPsi_Grad[iDim];
3378 
3379  /*--- Additional sensitivity term for grid movement ---*/
3380 
3381  if (grid_movement) {
3382  GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
3383  v_gradconspsi -= GridVel[iDim] * ConsPsi_Grad[iDim];
3384  }
3385 
3386  }
3387 
3388  /*--- Compute sensitivity for each surface point ---*/
3389 
3390  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = (d_press + grad_v + v_gradconspsi) * Area * scale * factor;
3391 
3392  /*--- If sharp edge, set the sensitivity to 0 on that region ---*/
3393 
3394  if (config->GetSens_Remove_Sharp()) {
3395  eps = config->GetVenkat_LimiterCoeff()*config->GetRefElemLength();
3396  if ( geometry->node[iPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance() < config->GetAdjSharp_LimiterCoeff()*eps )
3397  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = 0.0;
3398  }
3399 
3400  Sens_Geo[iMarker] -= CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex];
3401 
3402  }
3403  }
3404 
3405  Total_Sens_Geo += Sens_Geo[iMarker];
3406 
3407  }
3408  }
3409 
3410 
3411  /*--- Farfield Sensitivity (Mach, AoA, Press, Temp), only for compressible flows ---*/
3412 
3413 
3414  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3415  Sens_BPress[iMarker] = 0.0;
3416  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == OUTLET_FLOW) {
3417 
3418  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3419  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3420 
3421  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3422  Psi = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3423  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3424  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3425 
3426  Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
3427  if (grid_movement) Mach_Inf = config->GetMach_Motion();
3428 
3429  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3430  Area = sqrt(Area);
3431 
3432  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
3433 
3434  Vn = 0.0;
3435  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3436  Velocity[iDim] = U[iDim+1]/U[0];
3437  Vn += UnitNormal[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
3438  }
3439 
3440  SoundSpeed = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSoundSpeed();
3441  if (Vn<SoundSpeed && Vn>0) {
3442  /*TODO: MDO compatible*/
3443  Sens_BPress[iMarker]+=Psi[nDim+1]*(SoundSpeed*SoundSpeed-Vn*Vn)/(Vn*Gamma_Minus_One);
3444  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==SURFACE_STATIC_PRESSURE)
3445  Sens_BPress[iMarker]+=1;
3446  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==SURFACE_TOTAL_PRESSURE) {
3447  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++)
3448  Sens_BPress[iMarker]+=0.5*Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim]/(Vn*Vn);
3449  }
3450  }
3451  }
3452  Total_Sens_BPress+= Sens_BPress[iMarker] * scale * factor;
3453  }
3454  }
3455 
3456  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == FAR_FIELD || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INLET_FLOW
3457  || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SUPERSONIC_INLET || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SUPERSONIC_OUTLET
3458  || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ENGINE_INFLOW ) {
3459 
3460  Sens_Mach[iMarker] = 0.0;
3461  Sens_AoA[iMarker] = 0.0;
3462  Sens_Press[iMarker] = 0.0;
3463  Sens_Temp[iMarker] = 0.0;
3464 
3465  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3466  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3467 
3468  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3469  Psi = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3470  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3471  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3472 
3473  Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
3474  if (grid_movement) Mach_Inf = config->GetMach_Motion();
3475 
3476  r = U[0]; ru = U[1]; rv = U[2];
3477  if (nDim == 2) { rw = 0.0; rE = U[3]; }
3478  else { rw = U[3]; rE = U[4]; }
3479  p = Gamma_Minus_One*(rE-(ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(2*r));
3480 
3481  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3482  Area = sqrt(Area);
3483  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
3484 
3485  H = (rE + p)/r;
3486 
3487  dp_dr = Gamma_Minus_One*(ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(2*r*r);
3488  dp_dru = -Gamma_Minus_One*ru/r;
3489  dp_drv = -Gamma_Minus_One*rv/r;
3490  if (nDim == 2) { dp_drw = 0.0; dp_drE = Gamma_Minus_One; }
3491  else { dp_drw = -Gamma_Minus_One*rw/r; dp_drE = Gamma_Minus_One; }
3492 
3493  dH_dr = (-H + dp_dr)/r; dH_dru = dp_dru/r; dH_drv = dp_drv/r;
3494  if (nDim == 2) { dH_drw = 0.0; dH_drE = (1 + dp_drE)/r; }
3495  else { dH_drw = dp_drw/r; dH_drE = (1 + dp_drE)/r; }
3496 
3497  if (nDim == 2) {
3498  Jacobian_j[0][0] = 0.0;
3499  Jacobian_j[1][0] = Area*UnitNormal[0];
3500  Jacobian_j[2][0] = Area*UnitNormal[1];
3501  Jacobian_j[3][0] = 0.0;
3502 
3503  Jacobian_j[0][1] = (-(ru*ru)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3504  Jacobian_j[1][1] = (2*ru/r + dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3505  Jacobian_j[2][1] = (dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3506  Jacobian_j[3][1] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0];
3507 
3508  Jacobian_j[0][2] = (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(rv*rv)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3509  Jacobian_j[1][2] = (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3510  Jacobian_j[2][2] = (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (2*rv/r + dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3511  Jacobian_j[3][2] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3512 
3513  Jacobian_j[0][3] = (ru*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3514  Jacobian_j[1][3] = (H + ru*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3515  Jacobian_j[2][3] = (ru*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (H + rv*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3516  Jacobian_j[3][3] = (ru*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3517  }
3518  else {
3519  Jacobian_j[0][0] = 0.0;
3520  Jacobian_j[1][0] = Area*UnitNormal[0];
3521  Jacobian_j[2][0] = Area*UnitNormal[1];
3522  Jacobian_j[3][0] = Area*UnitNormal[2];
3523  Jacobian_j[4][0] = 0.0;
3524 
3525  Jacobian_j[0][1] = (-(ru*ru)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (-(ru*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3526  Jacobian_j[1][1] = (2*ru/r + dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3527  Jacobian_j[2][1] = (dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3528  Jacobian_j[3][1] = (dp_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3529  Jacobian_j[4][1] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0];
3530 
3531  Jacobian_j[0][2] = (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(rv*rv)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (-(rv*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3532  Jacobian_j[1][2] = (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3533  Jacobian_j[2][2] = (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (2*rv/r + dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3534  Jacobian_j[3][2] = (dp_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3535  Jacobian_j[4][2] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
3536 
3537  Jacobian_j[0][3] = (-(ru*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(rv*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (-(rw*rw)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3538  Jacobian_j[1][3] = (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3539  Jacobian_j[2][3] = (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3540  Jacobian_j[3][3] = (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (2*rw/r + dp_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3541  Jacobian_j[4][3] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3542 
3543  Jacobian_j[0][4] = (ru*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3544  Jacobian_j[1][4] = (H + ru*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3545  Jacobian_j[2][4] = (ru*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (H + rv*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3546  Jacobian_j[3][4] = (ru*dH_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (H + rw*dH_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3547  Jacobian_j[4][4] = (ru*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
3548  }
3549 
3550  /*--- Mach number sensitivity ---*/
3551 
3552  USens[0] = 0.0; USens[1] = ru/Mach_Inf; USens[2] = rv/Mach_Inf;
3553  if (nDim == 2) { USens[3] = Gamma*Mach_Inf*p; }
3554  else { USens[3] = rw/Mach_Inf; USens[4] = Gamma*Mach_Inf*p; }
3555  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
3556  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
3557  Sens_Mach[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
3558  }
3559  }
3560 
3561  /*--- AoA sensitivity ---*/
3562 
3563  USens[0] = 0.0;
3564  if (nDim == 2) { USens[1] = -rv; USens[2] = ru; USens[3] = 0.0; }
3565  else { USens[1] = -rw; USens[2] = 0.0; USens[3] = ru; USens[4] = 0.0; }
3566  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
3567  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
3568  Sens_AoA[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
3569  }
3570  }
3571 
3572  /*--- Pressure sensitivity ---*/
3573 
3574  USens[0] = r/p; USens[1] = ru/p; USens[2] = rv/p;
3575  if (nDim == 2) { USens[3] = rE/p; }
3576  else { USens[3] = rw/p; USens[4] = rE/p; }
3577  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
3578  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
3579  Sens_Press[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
3580  }
3581  }
3582 
3583  /*--- Temperature sensitivity ---*/
3584 
3585  T = p/(r*Gas_Constant);
3586  USens[0] = -r/T; USens[1] = 0.5*ru/T; USens[2] = 0.5*rv/T;
3587  if (nDim == 2) { USens[3] = (ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(r*T); }
3588  else { USens[3] = 0.5*rw/T; USens[4] = (ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(r*T); }
3589  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
3590  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
3591  Sens_Temp[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
3592  }
3593  }
3594  }
3595  }
3596 
3597  Total_Sens_Mach -= Sens_Mach[iMarker] * scale * factor;
3598  Total_Sens_AoA -= Sens_AoA[iMarker] * scale * factor;
3599  Total_Sens_Press -= Sens_Press[iMarker] * scale * factor;
3600  Total_Sens_Temp -= Sens_Temp[iMarker] * scale * factor;
3601 
3602  }
3603  }
3604 
3605  /*--- Explicit contribution from objective function quantity ---*/
3606 
3607  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3608 
3609  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL) {
3610 
3611  Sens_Mach[iMarker] = 0.0;
3612  Sens_AoA[iMarker] = 0.0;
3613  Sens_Press[iMarker] = 0.0;
3614  Sens_Temp[iMarker] = 0.0;
3615 
3616  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3617  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3618 
3619  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3620 
3621  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3622  p = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPressure();
3623 
3624  Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
3625  if (grid_movement) Mach_Inf = config->GetMach_Motion();
3626 
3627  d = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
3628  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3629  Area = sqrt(Area);
3630  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
3631 
3632  /*--- Mach number sensitivity ---*/
3633 
3634  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = -(2.0/Mach_Inf)*d[iPos];
3635  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) Sens_Mach[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
3636 
3637  /*--- AoA sensitivity ---*/
3638 
3639  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == DRAG_COEFFICIENT ||
3640  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == LIFT_COEFFICIENT ||
3641  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == SIDEFORCE_COEFFICIENT ||
3642  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == EQUIVALENT_AREA ||
3643  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == NEARFIELD_PRESSURE) {
3644  if (nDim == 2) {
3645  D[0][0] = 0.0; D[0][1] = -1.0;
3646  D[1][0] = 1.0; D[1][1] = 0.0;
3647  }
3648  else {
3649  D[0][0] = 0.0; D[0][1] = 0.0; D[0][2] = -1.0;
3650  D[1][0] = 0.0; D[1][1] = 0.0; D[1][2] = 0.0;
3651  D[2][0] = 1.0; D[2][1] = 0.0; D[2][2] = 0.0;
3652  }
3653  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = 0.0;
3654  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) {
3655  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nDim; jPos++)
3656  Dd[iPos] += D[iPos][jPos]*d[jPos];
3657  }
3658  }
3659 
3660  /*--- Coefficients with no explicit AoA dependece ---*/
3661 
3662  else {
3663  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = 0.0;
3664  }
3665 
3666  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++)
3667  Sens_AoA[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
3668 
3669  /*--- Pressure sensitivity ---*/
3670 
3671  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = -(1/p)*d[iPos];
3672  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++)
3673  Sens_Press[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
3674 
3675  /*--- Temperature sensitivity ---*/
3676 
3677  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = 0.0;
3678  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++)
3679  Sens_Temp[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
3680 
3681  }
3682  }
3683 
3684  Total_Sens_Mach += Sens_Mach[iMarker] * scale * factor;
3685  Total_Sens_AoA += Sens_AoA[iMarker] * scale * factor;
3686  Total_Sens_Press += Sens_Press[iMarker] * scale * factor;
3687  Total_Sens_Temp += Sens_Temp[iMarker] * scale * factor;
3688 
3689  }
3690  }
3691 
3692 
3693 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3694 
3695  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Geo = Total_Sens_Geo; Total_Sens_Geo = 0.0;
3696  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Mach = Total_Sens_Mach; Total_Sens_Mach = 0.0;
3697  su2double MyTotal_Sens_AoA = Total_Sens_AoA; Total_Sens_AoA = 0.0;
3698  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Press = Total_Sens_Press; Total_Sens_Press = 0.0;
3699  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Temp = Total_Sens_Temp; Total_Sens_Temp = 0.0;
3700  su2double MyTotal_Sens_BPress = Total_Sens_BPress; Total_Sens_BPress = 0.0;
3701 
3702  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Geo, &Total_Sens_Geo, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3703  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Mach, &Total_Sens_Mach, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3704  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_AoA, &Total_Sens_AoA, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3705  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Press, &Total_Sens_Press, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3706  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Temp, &Total_Sens_Temp, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3707  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_BPress, &Total_Sens_BPress, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3708 
3709 #endif
3710 
3711  delete [] USens;
3712  delete [] Velocity;
3713 
3714 }
3715 
3716 void CAdjEulerSolver::Smooth_Sensitivity(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config) {
3717  unsigned short iMarker;
3718  unsigned long iVertex, jVertex, nVertex, iPoint;
3719  su2double **A, *b, Sens, *ArchLength, *Coord_begin, *Coord_end, dist;
3720 
3721  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3722  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL) {
3723  nVertex = geometry->nVertex[iMarker];
3724 
3725  /*--- Allocate the linear system ---*/
3726 
3727  A = new su2double* [nVertex];
3728  b = new su2double [nVertex];
3729  ArchLength = new su2double [nVertex];
3730  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
3731  A[iVertex] = new su2double [nVertex];
3732  }
3733 
3734  /*--- Initialization ---*/
3735 
3736  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
3737  b[iVertex] = 0.0; ArchLength[iVertex] = 0.0;
3738  for (jVertex = 0; jVertex < nVertex; jVertex++)
3739  A[iVertex][jVertex] = 0.0;
3740  }
3741 
3742  /*--- Set the arch length ---*/
3743 
3744  ArchLength[0] = 0.0;
3745  for (iVertex = 1; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
3746  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex-1]->GetNode();
3747  Coord_begin = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3748  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3749  Coord_end = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3750  dist = sqrt (pow( Coord_end[0]-Coord_begin[0], 2.0) + pow( Coord_end[1]-Coord_begin[1], 2.0));
3751  ArchLength[iVertex] = ArchLength[iVertex-1] + dist;
3752  }
3753 
3754  /*--- Remove the trailing edge effect ---*/
3755 
3756  su2double MinPosSens = 0.0; su2double MinNegSens = 0.0;
3757  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
3758  Sens = CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex];
3759  if (ArchLength[iVertex] > ArchLength[nVertex-1]*0.01) { MinNegSens = Sens; break; }
3760  }
3761 
3762  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
3763  Sens = CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex];
3764  if (ArchLength[iVertex] > ArchLength[nVertex-1]*0.99) { MinPosSens = Sens; break; }
3765  }
3766 
3767  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
3768  if (ArchLength[iVertex] < ArchLength[nVertex-1]*0.01)
3769  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = MinNegSens;
3770  if (ArchLength[iVertex] > ArchLength[nVertex-1]*0.99)
3771  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = MinPosSens;
3772  }
3773 
3774  /*--- Set the right hand side of the system ---*/
3775 
3776  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
3777  b[iVertex] = CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex];
3778  }
3779 
3780  /*--- Set the mass matrix ---*/
3781 
3782  su2double Coeff = 0.0, BackDiff = 0.0, ForwDiff = 0.0, CentDiff = 0.0;
3783  su2double epsilon = 5E-5;
3784  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
3785 
3786  if ((iVertex != nVertex-1) && (iVertex != 0)) {
3787  BackDiff = (ArchLength[iVertex]-ArchLength[iVertex-1]);
3788  ForwDiff = (ArchLength[iVertex+1]-ArchLength[iVertex]);
3789  CentDiff = (ArchLength[iVertex+1]-ArchLength[iVertex-1]);
3790  }
3791  if (iVertex == nVertex-1) {
3792  BackDiff = (ArchLength[nVertex-1]-ArchLength[nVertex-2]);
3793  ForwDiff = (ArchLength[0]-ArchLength[nVertex-1]);
3794  CentDiff = (ArchLength[0]-ArchLength[nVertex-2]);
3795  }
3796  if (iVertex == 0) {
3797  BackDiff = (ArchLength[0]-ArchLength[nVertex-1]);
3798  ForwDiff = (ArchLength[1]-ArchLength[0]);
3799  CentDiff = (ArchLength[1]-ArchLength[nVertex-1]);
3800  }
3801 
3802  Coeff = epsilon*2.0/(BackDiff*ForwDiff*CentDiff);
3803 
3804  A[iVertex][iVertex] = Coeff*CentDiff;
3805 
3806  if (iVertex != 0) A[iVertex][iVertex-1] = -Coeff*ForwDiff;
3807  else A[iVertex][nVertex-1] = -Coeff*ForwDiff;
3808 
3809  if (iVertex != nVertex-1) A[iVertex][iVertex+1] = -Coeff*BackDiff;
3810  else A[iVertex][0] = -Coeff*BackDiff;
3811 
3812  }
3813 
3814  /*--- Add the gradient value in the main diagonal ---*/
3815 
3816  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++)
3817  A[iVertex][iVertex] += 1.0;
3818 
3819  /*--- Dirichlet boundary condition ---*/
3820 
3821  unsigned long iVertex = SU2_TYPE::Int(nVertex/2);
3822  A[iVertex][iVertex] = 1.0;
3823  A[iVertex][iVertex+1] = 0.0;
3824  A[iVertex][iVertex-1] = 0.0;
3825 
3826  Gauss_Elimination(A, b, (unsigned short)nVertex);
3827 
3828  /*--- Set the new value of the sensitiviy ---*/
3829 
3830  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++)
3831  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = b[iVertex];
3832 
3833  /*--- Deallocate the linear system ---*/
3834 
3835  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++)
3836  delete [] A[iVertex];
3837  delete [] A;
3838  delete [] b;
3839  delete [] ArchLength;
3840 
3841  }
3842  }
3843 
3844 
3845 }
3846 
3847 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetFarfield_AoA(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container,
3848  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, bool Output) {
3849 
3850  unsigned long Iter_Fixed_CL = config->GetIter_Fixed_CL();
3851  unsigned long ExtIter = config->GetExtIter();
3852  bool Update_AoA = false;
3853  su2double dCL_dAlpha = config->GetdCL_dAlpha()*180.0/PI_NUMBER;
3854  unsigned long Update_Alpha = config->GetUpdate_Alpha();
3855 
3856  if (ExtIter == 0) AoA_Counter = 0;
3857 
3858  /*--- Only the fine mesh level should check the convergence criteria ---*/
3859 
3860  if ((iMesh == MESH_0) && Output) {
3861 
3862  /*--- Initialize the update flag to false ---*/
3863 
3864  Update_AoA = false;
3865 
3866  /*--- Reevaluate the lift derivative with respect to Angle of Attack
3867  at a fix number of iterations ---*/
3868 
3869  if ((ExtIter % Iter_Fixed_CL == 0) && (ExtIter != 0)) {
3870  AoA_Counter++;
3871  if ((AoA_Counter <= Update_Alpha)) Update_AoA = true;
3872  Update_AoA = true;
3873  }
3874 
3875  /*--- Store the update boolean for use on other mesh levels in the MG ---*/
3876 
3877  config->SetUpdate_AoA(Update_AoA);
3878 
3879  }
3880 
3881  else {
3882  Update_AoA = config->GetUpdate_AoA();
3883  }
3884 
3885  /*--- If we are within two digits of convergence in the CL coefficient,
3886  compute an updated value for the AoA at the farfield. We are iterating
3887  on the AoA in order to match the specified fixed lift coefficient. ---*/
3888 
3889  if (Update_AoA && Output) {
3890 
3891  /*--- Retrieve the old ACoeff ---*/
3892 
3893  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == DRAG_COEFFICIENT) ACoeff_old = config->GetdCD_dCL();
3894  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_X_COEFFICIENT) ACoeff_old = config->GetdCMx_dCL();
3895  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_Y_COEFFICIENT) ACoeff_old = config->GetdCMy_dCL();
3896  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_Z_COEFFICIENT) ACoeff_old = config->GetdCMz_dCL();
3897  else ACoeff_old = 0.0;
3898 
3899  /*--- Estimate the increment in the A coeff, (note that the slope is negative, a decrease in
3900  * the CL derivative requires an increase in the A coeff ---*/
3901 
3902  /*--- A good estimation to d(dOF/dalpha)/dA_coeff is dCL_dAlpha ---*/
3903 
3904  ACoeff_inc = (1.0/dCL_dAlpha)*Total_Sens_AoA;
3905 
3906  /*--- Compute a new value for the A coeff based on the fine mesh only (radians)---*/
3907 
3908  if (iMesh == MESH_0) { ACoeff = ACoeff_old + ACoeff_inc; }
3909  else {
3910  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == DRAG_COEFFICIENT) ACoeff = config->GetdCD_dCL();
3911  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_X_COEFFICIENT) ACoeff = config->GetdCMx_dCL();
3912  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_Y_COEFFICIENT) ACoeff = config->GetdCMy_dCL();
3913  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_Z_COEFFICIENT) ACoeff = config->GetdCMz_dCL();
3914  else ACoeff = 0.0;
3915  }
3916 
3917  /*--- Only the fine mesh stores the updated values for ACoeff in config ---*/
3918 
3919  if (iMesh == MESH_0) {
3920  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == DRAG_COEFFICIENT) config->SetdCD_dCL(ACoeff);
3921  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_X_COEFFICIENT) config->SetdCMx_dCL(ACoeff);
3922  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_Y_COEFFICIENT) config->SetdCMy_dCL(ACoeff);
3923  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_Z_COEFFICIENT) config->SetdCMz_dCL(ACoeff);
3924  else { config->SetdCD_dCL(0.0); config->SetdCMx_dCL(0.0); config->SetdCMy_dCL(0.0); config->SetdCMz_dCL(0.0); }
3925  }
3926 
3927  /*--- Compute the adjoint boundary condition ---*/
3928 
3929  SetForceProj_Vector(geometry, solver_container, config);
3930 
3931  }
3932 
3933  /*--- Output some information to the console with the headers ---*/
3934 
3935  bool write_heads = ((ExtIter % Iter_Fixed_CL == 0) && (ExtIter != 0));
3936  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (iMesh == MESH_0) && write_heads && Output) {
3937  cout.precision(7);
3938  cout.setf(ios::fixed, ios::floatfield);
3939  cout << endl << "-------------------------- Adjoint Fixed CL Mode -------------------------" << endl;
3940  cout << "Target dCL/dAlpha: 0.0 (1/deg), current dCL/dAlpha: " << Total_Sens_AoA*PI_NUMBER/180;
3941  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == DRAG_COEFFICIENT) cout << " (1/deg), current dCD/dCL: " << config->GetdCD_dCL() <<" "<< endl;
3942  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_X_COEFFICIENT) cout << " (1/deg), current dCMx/dCL: " << config->GetdCMx_dCL() <<" "<< endl;
3943  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_Y_COEFFICIENT) cout << " (1/deg), current dCMy/dCL: " << config->GetdCMy_dCL() <<" "<< endl;
3944  else if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MOMENT_Z_COEFFICIENT) cout << " (1/deg), current dCMz/dCL: " << config->GetdCMz_dCL() <<" "<< endl;
3945  else cout << endl;
3946  cout << "-------------------------------------------------------------------------" << endl << endl;
3947  }
3948 
3949 
3950 }
3951 
3952 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Euler_Wall(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
3953  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
3954  su2double *d = NULL, *Normal, *U, *Psi_Aux, ProjVel = 0.0, bcn, vn = 0.0, Area, *UnitNormal;
3955  su2double *Velocity, *Psi, Enthalpy = 0.0, sq_vel, phin, phis1, phis2;
3956  unsigned short iDim, iVar, jDim;
3957 
3958  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
3959  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
3960 
3961  UnitNormal = new su2double[nDim];
3962  Velocity = new su2double[nDim];
3963  Psi = new su2double[nVar];
3964 
3965  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
3966  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3967 
3968  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3969  Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3970 
3971  /*--- Create a copy of the adjoint solution ---*/
3972  Psi_Aux = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3973  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Psi[iVar] = Psi_Aux[iVar];
3974 
3975  /*--- Flow solution ---*/
3976  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3977 
3978  /*--- Read the value of the objective function ---*/
3979  d = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
3980 
3981  /*--- Normal vector computation ---*/
3982  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3983  Area = sqrt(Area);
3984  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
3985 
3986  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3987  Velocity[iDim] = U[iDim+1] / U[0];
3988 
3989  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy();
3990  sq_vel = 0.5*solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetVelocity2();
3991 
3992  /*--- Compute projections ---*/
3993  ProjVel = 0.0; bcn = 0.0; vn = 0.0; phin = 0.0;
3994  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3995  ProjVel -= Velocity[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3996  bcn += d[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3997  vn += Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3998  phin += Psi[iDim+1]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3999  }
4000 
4001  /*--- Extra boundary term for grid movement ---*/
4002  if (grid_movement) {
4003  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
4004  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
4005  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4006  ProjGridVel += GridVel[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
4007  phin -= Psi[nVar-1]*ProjGridVel;
4008  }
4009 
4010  /*--- Introduce the boundary condition ---*/
4011  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4012  Psi[iDim+1] -= ( phin - bcn ) * UnitNormal[iDim];
4013 
4014  /*--- Inner products after introducing BC (Psi has changed) ---*/
4015  phis1 = 0.0; phis2 = Psi[0] + Enthalpy * Psi[nVar-1];
4016  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4017  phis1 -= Normal[iDim]*Psi[iDim+1];
4018  phis2 += Velocity[iDim]*Psi[iDim+1];
4019  }
4020 
4021  /*--- Flux of the Euler wall ---*/
4022  Residual[0] = ProjVel * Psi[0] - phis2 * ProjVel + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One * sq_vel;
4023  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4024  Residual[iDim+1] = ProjVel * Psi[iDim+1] - phis2 * Normal[iDim] - phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One * Velocity[iDim];
4025  Residual[nVar-1] = ProjVel * Psi[nVar-1] + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One;
4026 
4027  /*--- Flux adjustment for grid movement ---*/
4028  if (grid_movement) {
4029  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
4030  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
4031  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4032  ProjGridVel -= GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
4033  Residual[0] -= ProjGridVel*Psi[0];
4034  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4035  Residual[iDim+1] -= ProjGridVel*Psi[iDim+1];
4036  Residual[nVar-1] -= ProjGridVel*Psi[nVar-1];
4037  }
4038 
4039  if (implicit) {
4040 
4041  /*--- Adjoint density ---*/
4042  Jacobian_ii[0][0] = 0.0;
4043  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4044  Jacobian_ii[0][iDim+1] = -ProjVel * (Velocity[iDim] - UnitNormal[iDim] * vn);
4045  Jacobian_ii[0][nVar-1] = -ProjVel * Enthalpy;
4046 
4047  /*--- Adjoint velocities ---*/
4048  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4049  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][0] = -Normal[iDim];
4050  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
4051  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][jDim+1] = -ProjVel*(UnitNormal[jDim]*UnitNormal[iDim] - Normal[iDim] * (Velocity[jDim] - UnitNormal[jDim] * vn));
4052  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][iDim+1] += ProjVel;
4053  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][nVar-1] = -Normal[iDim] * Enthalpy;
4054  }
4055 
4056  /*--- Adjoint energy ---*/
4057  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][0] = 0.0;
4058  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4059  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][iDim+1] = 0.0;
4060  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][nVar-1] = ProjVel;
4061 
4062  /*--- Jacobian contribution due to grid movement ---*/
4063  if (grid_movement) {
4064  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
4065  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
4066  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4067  ProjGridVel -= GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
4068  Jacobian_ii[0][0] -= ProjGridVel;
4069  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4070  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][iDim+1] -= ProjGridVel;
4071  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][nVar-1] -= ProjGridVel;
4072  }
4073 
4074  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4075 
4076  }
4077 
4078  /*--- Update residual ---*/
4079  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
4080 
4081  }
4082  }
4083 
4084  delete [] Velocity;
4085  delete [] UnitNormal;
4086  delete [] Psi;
4087 
4088 }
4089 
4090 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Sym_Plane(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics,
4091  CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
4092 
4093  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
4094  su2double *Normal, ProjVel = 0.0, vn = 0.0, Area, *UnitNormal,
4095  *Psi_domain, *Psi_sym, *Velocity, Enthalpy = 0.0,
4096  sq_vel, phin, phis1, phis2;
4097  unsigned short iDim, iVar, jDim;
4098 
4099  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
4100  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
4101 
4102  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4103  UnitNormal = new su2double[nDim];
4104  Velocity = new su2double[nDim];
4105  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar];
4106  Psi_sym = new su2double[nVar];
4107 
4108  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
4109 
4110  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4111 
4112  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
4113 
4114  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4115 
4116  Area = 0;
4117  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
4118  Area = sqrt(Area);
4119 
4120  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4121  UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
4122 
4123  /*--- Create a copy of the adjoint solution ---*/
4124 
4125  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4126 
4127  /*--- Retrieve flow variables ---*/
4128 
4129  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4130  Velocity[iDim] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetVelocity(iDim);
4131 
4132  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy();
4133  sq_vel = 0.5*solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetVelocity2();
4134 
4135  /*--- Compute projections ---*/
4136 
4137  ProjVel = 0.0; vn = 0.0; phin = 0.0;
4138  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4139  ProjVel -= Velocity[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
4140  vn += Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
4141  phin += Psi_domain[iDim+1]*UnitNormal[iDim];
4142  }
4143 
4144  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
4145 
4146  if (grid_movement) {
4147  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
4148  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
4149  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4150  ProjGridVel += GridVel[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
4151  }
4152  phin -= Psi_domain[nVar-1]*ProjGridVel;
4153  }
4154 
4155  /*--- Introduce the boundary condition ---*/
4156
