4157  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4158  Psi_domain[iDim+1] -= phin * UnitNormal[iDim];
4159 
4160  /*--- Inner products after introducing BC (Psi has changed) ---*/
4161 
4162  phis1 = 0.0; phis2 = Psi_domain[0] + Enthalpy * Psi_domain[nVar-1];
4163  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4164  phis1 -= Normal[iDim]*Psi_domain[iDim+1];
4165  phis2 += Velocity[iDim]*Psi_domain[iDim+1];
4166  }
4167 
4168  /*--- Flux of the Euler wall ---*/
4169 
4170  Residual_i[0] = ProjVel * Psi_domain[0] - phis2 * ProjVel + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One * sq_vel;
4171  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4172  Residual_i[iDim+1] = ProjVel * Psi_domain[iDim+1] - phis2 * Normal[iDim] - phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One * Velocity[iDim];
4173  Residual_i[nVar-1] = ProjVel * Psi_domain[nVar-1] + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One;
4174 
4175  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
4176 
4177  if (grid_movement) {
4178  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
4179  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
4180  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4181  ProjGridVel -= GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
4182  Residual_i[0] -= ProjGridVel*Psi_domain[0];
4183  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4184  Residual_i[iDim+1] -= ProjGridVel*Psi_domain[iDim+1];
4185  Residual_i[nVar-1] -= ProjGridVel*Psi_domain[nVar-1];
4186  }
4187 
4188  /*--- Update residual ---*/
4189 
4190  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4191 
4192  /*--- Implicit stuff ---*/
4193 
4194  if (implicit) {
4195 
4196  /*--- Adjoint density ---*/
4197 
4198  Jacobian_ii[0][0] = 0.0;
4199  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4200  Jacobian_ii[0][iDim+1] = -ProjVel * (Velocity[iDim] - UnitNormal[iDim] * vn);
4201  Jacobian_ii[0][nVar-1] = -ProjVel * Enthalpy;
4202 
4203  /*--- Adjoint velocities ---*/
4204 
4205  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4206  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][0] = -Normal[iDim];
4207  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
4208  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][jDim+1] = -ProjVel*(UnitNormal[jDim]*UnitNormal[iDim] - Normal[iDim] * (Velocity[jDim] - UnitNormal[jDim] * vn));
4209  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][iDim+1] += ProjVel;
4210  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][nVar-1] = -Normal[iDim] * Enthalpy;
4211  }
4212 
4213  /*--- Adjoint energy ---*/
4214 
4215  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][0] = 0.0;
4216  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4217  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][iDim+1] = 0.0;
4218  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][nVar-1] = ProjVel;
4219 
4220  /*--- Contribution from grid movement ---*/
4221 
4222  if (grid_movement) {
4223  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
4224  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
4225  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4226  ProjGridVel -= GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
4227  Jacobian_ii[0][0] -= ProjGridVel;
4228  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4229  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][iDim+1] -= ProjGridVel;
4230  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][nVar-1] -= ProjGridVel;
4231  }
4232 
4233  /*--- Update jacobian ---*/
4234 
4235  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4236 
4237  }
4238 
4239  }
4240  }
4241 
4242  delete [] Velocity;
4243  delete [] Psi_domain;
4244  delete [] Psi_sym;
4245  delete [] Normal;
4246  delete [] UnitNormal;
4247 
4248 }
4249 
4250 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Interface_Boundary(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
4251  CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
4252 
4253  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, GlobalIndex_iPoint, GlobalIndex_jPoint;
4254  unsigned short iDim, iVar;
4255  su2double *V_i;
4256 
4257  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
4258 
4259  su2double *Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4260  su2double *Psi_i = new su2double[nVar];
4261  su2double *Psi_j = new su2double[nVar];
4262 
4263  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
4264 
4265  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4266  GlobalIndex_iPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
4267  GlobalIndex_jPoint = GetDonorGlobalIndex(val_marker, iVertex);
4268 
4269  if ((geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) && (GlobalIndex_iPoint != GlobalIndex_jPoint)) {
4270 
4271  /*--- Store the solution for both points ---*/
4272 
4273  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4274  Psi_i[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4275  Psi_j[iVar] = GetDonorAdjVar(val_marker, iVertex, iVar);
4276  }
4277 
4278  /*--- Set adjoint Variables ---*/
4279 
4280  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_i, Psi_j);
4281 
4282  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction (the same at both points) ---*/
4283 
4284  V_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
4285  numerics->SetPrimitive(V_i, V_i);
4286 
4287  /*--- Set Normal ---*/
4288 
4289  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4290  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4291  numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4292 
4293  /*--- Compute the convective residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
4294  numerics->ComputeResidual(Res_Conv_i, Res_Conv_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4295 
4296  /*--- Add Residuals and Jacobians ---*/
4297 
4298  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
4299  if (implicit) Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4300 
4301  }
4302  }
4303 
4304 
4305  delete[] Normal;
4306  delete[] Psi_i;
4307  delete[] Psi_j;
4308 
4309 }
4310 
4311 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_NearField_Boundary(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
4312  CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
4313 
4314  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, GlobalIndex_iPoint, GlobalIndex_jPoint;
4315  unsigned short iDim, iVar;
4316  su2double *V_i, *IntBoundary_Jump;
4317 
4318  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
4319 
4320  su2double *Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4321  su2double *Psi_i = new su2double[nVar];
4322  su2double *Psi_j = new su2double[nVar];
4323  su2double *Psi_out = new su2double[nVar];
4324  su2double *Psi_in = new su2double[nVar];
4325  su2double *Psi_out_ghost = new su2double[nVar];
4326  su2double *Psi_in_ghost = new su2double[nVar];
4327 
4328  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
4329 
4330  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4331  GlobalIndex_iPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
4332  GlobalIndex_jPoint = GetDonorGlobalIndex(val_marker, iVertex);
4333 
4334  if ((geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) && (GlobalIndex_iPoint != GlobalIndex_jPoint)) {
4335 
4336  /*--- Store the solution for both points ---*/
4337 
4338  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4339  Psi_i[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4340  Psi_j[iVar] = GetDonorAdjVar(val_marker, iVertex, iVar);
4341  }
4342 
4343  /*--- Set Normal ---*/
4344 
4345  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4346  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4347  numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4348 
4349  /*--- If equivalent area or nearfield pressure condition ---*/
4350 
4351  if ((config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == EQUIVALENT_AREA) ||
4352  (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == NEARFIELD_PRESSURE)) {
4353 
4354  /*--- Read the jump ---*/
4355 
4356  IntBoundary_Jump = node[iPoint]->GetIntBoundary_Jump();
4357 
4358  /*--- Inner point ---*/
4359 
4360  if (Normal[nDim-1] < 0.0) {
4361  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4362  Psi_in[iVar] = Psi_i[iVar]; Psi_out[iVar] = Psi_j[iVar];
4363  Psi_in_ghost[iVar] = Psi_out[iVar] - IntBoundary_Jump[iVar];
4364  }
4365  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_in, Psi_in_ghost);
4366  }
4367 
4368  /*--- Outer point ---*/
4369 
4370  else {
4371  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4372  Psi_in[iVar] = Psi_j[iVar]; Psi_out[iVar] = Psi_i[iVar];
4373  Psi_out_ghost[iVar] = Psi_in[iVar] + IntBoundary_Jump[iVar];
4374  }
4375  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_out, Psi_out_ghost);
4376  }
4377  }
4378  else {
4379 
4380  /*--- Just do a periodic BC ---*/
4381 
4382  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_i, Psi_j);
4383 
4384  }
4385 
4386  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction (the same at both points) ---*/
4387 
4388  V_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
4389  numerics->SetPrimitive(V_i, V_i);
4390 
4391  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
4392 
4393  numerics->ComputeResidual(Res_Conv_i, Res_Conv_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4394 
4395  /*--- Add Residuals and Jacobians ---*/
4396 
4397  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
4398  if (implicit) Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4399 
4400  }
4401  }
4402 
4403  delete[] Normal;
4404  delete[] Psi_i;
4405  delete[] Psi_j;
4406  delete[] Psi_out;
4407  delete[] Psi_in;
4408  delete[] Psi_out_ghost;
4409  delete[] Psi_in_ghost;
4410 
4411 }
4412 
4413 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Far_Field(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
4414 
4415  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
4416  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
4417  su2double *Normal, *V_domain, *V_infty, *Psi_domain, *Psi_infty;
4418 
4419  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
4420  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
4421 
4422  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4423  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar]; Psi_infty = new su2double[nVar];
4424 
4425  /*--- Loop over all the vertices ---*/
4426 
4427  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
4428  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4429 
4430  /*--- If the node belongs to the domain ---*/
4431 
4432  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
4433 
4434  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
4435 
4436  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
4437 
4438  /*--- Set the normal vector ---*/
4439 
4440  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4441  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4442  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4443 
4444  /*--- Allocate the value at the infinity ---*/
4445 
4446  V_infty = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
4447 
4448  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
4449 
4450  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
4451 
4452  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_infty);
4453 
4454  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the wall ---*/
4455 
4456  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4457  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4458  Psi_infty[iVar] = 0.0;
4459  }
4460  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_infty);
4461 
4462  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
4463 
4464  if (grid_movement)
4465  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
4466 
4467  /*--- Compute the upwind flux ---*/
4468 
4469  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4470 
4471  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
4472 
4473  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4474 
4475  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
4476 
4477  if (implicit)
4478  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4479 
4480  /*--- Viscous residual contribution, it doesn't work ---*/
4481 
4482  if (config->GetViscous()) {
4483 
4484  /*--- Points in edge, coordinates and normal vector---*/
4485 
4486  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
4487  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4488 
4489  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction and adjoint variables w/o reconstruction---*/
4490 
4491  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_infty);
4492  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_infty);
4493 
4494  /*--- Gradient and limiter of Adjoint Variables ---*/
4495 
4496  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
4497 
4498  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
4499 
4500  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4501 
4502  /*--- Update adjoint viscous residual ---*/
4503 
4504  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4505 
4506  if (implicit)
4507  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4508 
4509  }
4510 
4511  }
4512  }
4513 
4514  delete [] Normal;
4515  delete [] Psi_domain; delete [] Psi_infty;
4516 }
4517 
4518 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Supersonic_Inlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container,
4519  CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
4520  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
4521  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
4522  su2double *V_inlet, *V_domain, *Normal, *Psi_domain, *Psi_inlet;
4523 
4524  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
4525  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
4526  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
4527 
4528  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4529  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar]; Psi_inlet = new su2double[nVar];
4530 
4531  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
4532 
4533  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
4534  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4535 
4536  /*--- Check that the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
4537 
4538  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
4539 
4540  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
4541 
4542  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4543  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4544  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4545 
4546  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
4547 
4548  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
4549 
4550  /*--- Retrieve solution at the boundary node ---*/
4551 
4552  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
4553 
4554  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the boundary ---*/
4555 
4556  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4557  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4558 
4559  /*--- Construct the flow & adjoint states at the inlet ---*/
4560  /*--- Supersonic Inlet: All characteristic are exiting: using nearest neighbor to set value ---*/
4561  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4562  Psi_inlet[iVar] = Psi_domain[iVar];
4563 
4564  /*--- Set the flow and adjoint states in the solver ---*/
4565 
4566  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
4567  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_inlet);
4568 
4569  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
4570 
4571  if (grid_movement)
4572  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
4573  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
4574 
4575  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
4576 
4577  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij,
4578  Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4579 
4580  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
4581 
4582  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4583 
4584  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
4585 
4586  if (implicit)
4587  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4588 
4589  /*--- Viscous residual contribution, it doesn't work ---*/
4590 
4591  if (config->GetViscous()) {
4592 
4593  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
4594 
4595  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
4596 
4597  /*--- Points in edge, coordinates and normal vector---*/
4598 
4599  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
4600  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4601 
4602  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction and adjoint variables w/o reconstruction---*/
4603 
4604  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
4605  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_inlet);
4606 
4607  /*--- Gradient and limiter of Adjoint Variables ---*/
4608 
4609  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
4610 
4611  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
4612 
4613  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4614 
4615  /*--- Update adjoint viscous residual ---*/
4616 
4617  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4618 
4619  if (implicit)
4620  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4621 
4622  }
4623  }
4624  }
4625 
4626  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
4627 
4628  delete [] Normal;
4629  delete [] Psi_domain; delete [] Psi_inlet;
4630 
4631 }
4632 
4633 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Supersonic_Outlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container,
4634  CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
4635  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
4636  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
4637  su2double *V_outlet, *V_domain, *Normal, *Psi_domain, *Psi_outlet;
4638 
4639  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
4640  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
4641  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
4642 
4643  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4644  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar]; Psi_outlet = new su2double[nVar];
4645 
4646  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
4647 
4648  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
4649  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4650 
4651  /*--- Check that the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
4652 
4653  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
4654 
4655  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
4656 
4657  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4658  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4659  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4660 
4661  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
4662 
4663  V_outlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
4664 
4665  /*--- Retrieve solution at the boundary node ---*/
4666 
4667  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
4668 
4669  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the boundary ---*/
4670 
4671  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4672  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4673 
4674  /*--- Construct the flow & adjoint states at the inlet ---*/
4675 
4676  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4677  Psi_outlet[iVar] = 0.0;
4678 
4679  /*--- Set the flow and adjoint states in the solver ---*/
4680 
4681  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
4682  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_outlet);
4683 
4684  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
4685 
4686  if (grid_movement)
4687  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
4688  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
4689 
4690  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
4691 
4692  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij,
4693  Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4694 
4695  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
4696 
4697  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4698 
4699  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
4700 
4701  if (implicit)
4702  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4703 
4704  /*--- Viscous residual contribution (check again, Point_Normal was not being initialized before) ---*/
4705 
4706  if (config->GetViscous()) {
4707 
4708  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
4709 
4710  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
4711 
4712  /*--- Points in edge, coordinates and normal vector---*/
4713 
4714  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
4715  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4716 
4717  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction and adjoint variables w/o reconstruction---*/
4718 
4719  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
4720  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_outlet);
4721 
4722  /*--- Gradient and limiter of Adjoint Variables ---*/
4723 
4724  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
4725 
4726  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
4727 
4728  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4729 
4730  /*--- Update adjoint viscous residual ---*/
4731 
4732  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4733 
4734  if (implicit)
4735  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4736 
4737  }
4738  }
4739  }
4740 
4741  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
4742 
4743  delete [] Normal;
4744  delete [] Psi_domain; delete [] Psi_outlet;
4745 
4746 }
4747 
4748 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Inlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
4749 
4750  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
4751  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
4752  su2double Velocity[3], bcn, phin, Area, UnitNormal[3],
4753  ProjGridVel, *GridVel;
4754  su2double *V_inlet, *V_domain, *Normal, *Psi_domain, *Psi_inlet;
4755 
4756  unsigned short Kind_Inlet = config->GetKind_Inlet();
4757  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
4758  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
4759  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
4760 
4761  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4762  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar]; Psi_inlet = new su2double[nVar];
4763 
4764  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
4765 
4766  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
4767  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4768 
4769  /*--- Check that the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
4770 
4771  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
4772 
4773  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
4774 
4775  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4776  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4777  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4778 
4779  Area = 0.0;
4780  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4781  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
4782  Area = sqrt (Area);
4783 
4784  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4785  UnitNormal[iDim] = Normal[iDim]/Area;
4786 
4787  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
4788 
4789  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
4790 
4791  /*--- Retrieve solution at the boundary node ---*/
4792 
4793  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
4794 
4795  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the boundary ---*/
4796 
4797  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4798  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4799 
4800  /*--- Construct the flow & adjoint states at the inlet ---*/
4801 
4802  /*--- Subsonic, compressible inflow: first build the flow state
4803  using the same method as the direct problem. Then, based on
4804  those conservative values, compute the characteristic-based
4805  adjoint boundary condition. The boundary update to be applied
4806  depends on whether total conditions or mass flow are specified. ---*/
4807 
4808  switch (Kind_Inlet) {
4809 
4810  /*--- Total properties have been specified at the inlet. ---*/
4811  case TOTAL_CONDITIONS:
4812 
4813  /*--- Adjoint solution at the inlet. Set to zero for now
4814  but should be replaced with derived expression for this type of
4815  inlet. ---*/
4816  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4817  Psi_inlet[iVar] = 0.0;
4818 
4819  break;
4820 
4821  /*--- Mass flow has been specified at the inlet. ---*/
4822  case MASS_FLOW:
4823 
4824  /*--- Get primitives from current inlet state. ---*/
4825  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4826  Velocity[iDim] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetVelocity(iDim);
4827 
4828  /*--- Retrieve current adjoint solution values at the boundary ---*/
4829  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4830  Psi_inlet[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4831 
4832  /*--- Some terms needed for the adjoint BC ---*/
4833  bcn = 0.0; phin = 0.0;
4834  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4835  bcn -= (Gamma/Gamma_Minus_One)*Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
4836  phin += Psi_domain[iDim+1]*UnitNormal[iDim];
4837  }
4838 
4839  /*--- Extra boundary term for grid movement ---*/
4840  if (grid_movement) {
4841  ProjGridVel = 0.0;
4842  GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
4843  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4844  ProjGridVel += GridVel[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
4845  bcn -= (1.0/Gamma_Minus_One)*ProjGridVel;
4846  }
4847 
4848  /*--- Impose value for PsiE based on hand-derived expression. ---*/
4849  Psi_inlet[nVar-1] = -phin*(1.0/bcn);
4850 
4851  break;
4852  }
4853 
4854 
4855  /*--- Set the flow and adjoint states in the solver ---*/
4856 
4857  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
4858  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_inlet);
4859 
4860  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
4861 
4862  if (grid_movement)
4863  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
4864  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
4865 
4866  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
4867 
4868  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij,
4869  Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4870 
4871  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
4872 
4873  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4874 
4875  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
4876 
4877  if (implicit)
4878  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4879 
4880  /*--- Viscous residual contribution, it doesn't work ---*/
4881 
4882  if (config->GetViscous()) {
4883  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
4884 
4885  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
4886 
4887  /*--- Points in edge, coordinates and normal vector---*/
4888 
4889  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
4890  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4891 
4892  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction and adjoint variables w/o reconstruction---*/
4893 
4894  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
4895  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_inlet);
4896 
4897  /*--- Gradient and limiter of Adjoint Variables ---*/
4898 
4899  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
4900 
4901  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
4902 
4903  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4904 
4905  /*--- Update adjoint viscous residual ---*/
4906 
4907  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4908 
4909  if (implicit)
4910  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4911 
4912  }
4913  }
4914  }
4915 
4916  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
4917 
4918  delete [] Normal;
4919  delete [] Psi_domain; delete [] Psi_inlet;
4920 
4921 }
4922 
4923 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Outlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
4924 
4925  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
4926  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
4927  su2double Pressure=0.0, P_Exit=0.0, Velocity2 = 0.0, Area=0.0, Density=0.0,
4928  Vn = 0.0, SoundSpeed = 0.0, Vn_Exit=0.0, ProjGridVel = 0.0,
4929  Riemann=0.0, Entropy=0.0, Vn_rel=0.0;
4930  su2double Velocity[3], UnitNormal[3];
4931  su2double *V_outlet, *V_domain, *Psi_domain, *Psi_outlet, *Normal;
4932  su2double a1=0.0, a2=0.0; /*Placeholder terms to simplify expressions/ repeated terms*/
4933  /*Gradient terms for the generalized boundary */
4934  su2double density_gradient=0.0, pressure_gradient=0.0, velocity_gradient=0.0;
4935 
4936  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
4937  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
4938  su2double Weight_ObjFunc = 1.0;
4939  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
4940  string Monitoring_Tag;
4941  unsigned short jMarker=0, iMarker_Monitoring=0;
4942 
4943  Psi_domain = new su2double [nVar]; Psi_outlet = new su2double [nVar];
4944  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4945 
4946  /*--- Identify marker monitoring index ---*/
4947  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); jMarker++) {
4948  Monitoring_Tag = config->GetMarker_Monitoring_TagBound(jMarker);
4949  if (Monitoring_Tag==Marker_Tag)
4950  iMarker_Monitoring = jMarker;
4951  }
4952 
4953  Weight_ObjFunc = config->GetWeight_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring);
4954 
4955  /*--- Loop over all the vertices ---*/
4956 
4957  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
4958  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4959 
4960  /*--- If the node belong to the domain ---*/
4961 
4962  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
4963 
4964  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
4965 
4966  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4967  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4968  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4969 
4970  Area = 0.0;
4971  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4972  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
4973  Area = sqrt (Area);
4974 
4975  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4976  UnitNormal[iDim] = Normal[iDim]/Area;
4977 
4978  /*--- Set the normal point ---*/
4979 
4980  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
4981 
4982  conv_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
4983 
4984  /*--- Allocate the value at the outlet ---*/
4985 
4986  V_outlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
4987 
4988  /*--- Retrieve solution at the boundary node ---*/
4989 
4990  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
4991 
4992  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the boundary ---*/
4993 
4994  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4995  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4996 
4997  /*--- Construct the flow & adjoint states at the outlet ---*/
4998 
4999  /*--- Retrieve the specified back pressure for this outlet, Non-dim. the inputs if necessary. ---*/
5000 
5001  P_Exit = config->GetOutlet_Pressure(Marker_Tag);
5002  P_Exit = P_Exit/config->GetPressure_Ref();
5003 
5004  /*--- Check whether the flow is supersonic at the exit. The type
5005  of boundary update depends on this. ---*/
5006 
5007  Density = V_domain[nDim+2];
5008  Velocity2 = 0.0; Vn = 0.0;
5009  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5010  Velocity[iDim] = V_domain[iDim+1];
5011  Velocity2 += Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
5012  Vn += Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
5013  }
5014  /*--- Extra boundary term for grid movement ---*/
5015  if (grid_movement) {
5016  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
5017  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5018  ProjGridVel += GridVel[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
5019  }
5020 
5021  Pressure = V_domain[nDim+1];
5022  SoundSpeed = sqrt(Pressure*Gamma/Density);
5023 
5024  /*--- Set Adjoint variables to 0 initially ---*/
5025  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5026  Psi_outlet[iVar] = 0.0;
5027  }
5028 
5029  if (Vn > SoundSpeed) {
5030  /*--- Objective-dependent additions to energy term ---*/
5031  Vn_Exit = Vn; /* Vn_Exit comes from Reiman conditions in subsonic case*/
5032  Vn_rel = Vn_Exit-ProjGridVel;
5033  /* Repeated term */
5034  a1 = Gamma_Minus_One/(Vn_rel*Vn_rel-SoundSpeed*SoundSpeed);
5035 
5036  switch (config->GetKind_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring)) {
5037  case SURFACE_TOTAL_PRESSURE:
5038  /*--- Total Pressure term. NOTE: this is AREA averaged
5039  * Additional terms are added later (as they are common between subsonic,
5040  * supersonic equations) ---*/
5041  Velocity2 = 0.0;
5042  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5043  Velocity2 += Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
5044  }
5045  a2 = Pressure*(Gamma/Gamma_Minus_One)*pow((1.0+Gamma_Minus_One*Density*Velocity2/(2.0*Gamma*Pressure)),1.0/Gamma_Minus_One);
5046  density_gradient = a2*(Gamma_Minus_One*Velocity2/(2.0*Gamma*Pressure));
5047  velocity_gradient = 0.0;
5048  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++)
5049  velocity_gradient+=a2*Gamma_Minus_One*Density/(Gamma*Pressure)*Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
5050  pressure_gradient = a2*(-Gamma_Minus_One*Density*Velocity2/(2.0*Gamma*pow(Pressure,2.0)))+pow((1.0+Gamma_Minus_One*Density*Velocity2/(2.0*Gamma*Pressure)),(Gamma/Gamma_Minus_One));
5051  Psi_outlet[nDim+1]+=Weight_ObjFunc*a1*(density_gradient/Vn_rel+pressure_gradient*Vn_rel-velocity_gradient/Density);
5052  break;
5053  case SURFACE_STATIC_PRESSURE:
5054  /*Area averaged static pressure*/
5055  /*--- Note: further terms are NOT added later for this case, only energy term is modified ---*/
5056  Psi_outlet[nDim+1]+=Weight_ObjFunc*(a1*Vn_Exit);
5057  break;
5058  default:
5059  break;
5060  }
5061  } else {
5062  /*---Subsonic Case: Psi-rho E term from volume, objective-specific terms which are common
5063  * between subsonic and supersonic cases are added later ---*/
5064  /*--- Compute Riemann constant ---*/
5065  Entropy = Pressure*pow(1.0/Density, Gamma);
5066  Riemann = Vn + 2.0*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One;
5067 
5068  /*--- Compute the new fictious state at the outlet ---*/
5069  Density = pow(P_Exit/Entropy,1.0/Gamma);
5070  SoundSpeed = sqrt(Gamma*P_Exit/Density);
5071  Vn_Exit = Riemann - 2.0*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One;
5072  /*--- Update velocity terms ---*/
5073  Vn_rel = Vn_Exit-ProjGridVel;
5074 
5075  Velocity2 = 0.0;
5076  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5077  Velocity[iDim] = Velocity[iDim] + (Vn_Exit-Vn)*UnitNormal[iDim];
5078  Velocity2 += Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
5079  }
5080 
5081  /*--- Extra boundary term for grid movement ---*/
5082 
5083  if (grid_movement) {
5084  ProjGridVel = 0.0;
5085  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
5086  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5087  ProjGridVel += GridVel[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
5088  }
5089 
5090  /*--- Impose values for PsiRho & Phi using PsiE from domain. ---*/
5091 
5092  Psi_outlet[nVar-1] = Psi_domain[nVar-1];
5093 
5094  }
5095 
5096  /*--- When Psi_outlet[nVar-1] is not 0, the other terms of Psi_outlet must be updated
5097  This occurs when subsonic, or for certain objective functions ---*/
5098  if ( Psi_outlet[nVar-1] !=0.0 ) {
5099  /*--- Shorthand for repeated term in the boundary conditions ---*/
5100  a1 = 0.0;
5101  if (Vn!=0.0)
5102  a1 = SoundSpeed*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One/Vn;
5103  Psi_outlet[0] += Psi_outlet[nVar-1]*(Velocity2*0.5+Vn_rel*a1);
5104  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5105  Psi_outlet[iDim+1] += -Psi_outlet[nVar-1]*(a1*UnitNormal[iDim] + Velocity[iDim]);
5106  }
5107  }
5108 
5109 
5110  /*--- Add terms for objective functions where additions are needed outside the energy term
5111  * Terms which are added to the energy term are taken care of in the supersonic section above ---*/
5112  switch (config->GetKind_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring)) {
5113  case SURFACE_MASSFLOW:
5114  Psi_outlet[0]+=Weight_ObjFunc;
5115  break;
5116  case SURFACE_TOTAL_PRESSURE:
5117  /*--- For total pressure objective function. NOTE: this is AREA averaged term---*/
5118  Velocity2 = 0.0;
5119  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5120  Velocity2 += Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
5121  if (Vn_Exit !=0.0) {
5122  a2 = Pressure*(Gamma/Gamma_Minus_One)*pow((1.0+Gamma_Minus_One*Density*Velocity2/(2.0*Gamma*Pressure)),1.0/(Gamma_Minus_One));
5123  density_gradient = a2*(Gamma_Minus_One*Velocity2/(2.0*Gamma*Pressure));
5124  velocity_gradient=a2*Gamma_Minus_One*Density/(Gamma*Pressure); // re-using variable as the constant multiplying V[i] for dj/dvi
5125  Psi_outlet[0]+=Weight_ObjFunc*(density_gradient*2.0/Vn_Exit);
5126  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++) {
5127  Psi_outlet[0]-=Weight_ObjFunc*(velocity_gradient*Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim]/(Density*Vn_Exit));
5128  Psi_outlet[iDim+1] += Weight_ObjFunc*(velocity_gradient*Velocity[iDim]/(Density*Vn_Exit) - UnitNormal[iDim]*density_gradient/(Vn_Exit*Vn_Exit));
5129  }
5130  }
5131  break;
5132  case SURFACE_STATIC_PRESSURE:
5133  /*0.0*/
5134  break;
5135  default:
5136  break;
5137  }
5138 
5139  /*--- Set the flow and adjoint states in the solver ---*/
5140 
5141  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
5142  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_outlet);
5143 
5144  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
5145 
5146  if (grid_movement)
5147  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
5148  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
5149 
5150  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij,
5151  Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
5152 
5153  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
5154 
5155  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
5156 
5157  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
5158 
5159  if (implicit)
5160  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
5161 
5162  /*--- Viscous residual contribution, it doesn't work ---*/
5163 
5164  if (config->GetViscous()) {
5165 
5166  /*--- Set laminar and eddy viscosity at the infinity ---*/
5167  V_outlet[nDim+5] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetLaminarViscosity();
5168  V_outlet[nDim+6] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEddyViscosity();
5169 
5170  /*--- Points in edge, coordinates and normal vector---*/
5171  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
5172  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
5173 
5174  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction and adjoint variables w/o reconstruction---*/
5175 
5176  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
5177  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_outlet);
5178 
5179  /*--- Turbulent kinetic energy ---*/
5180  if (config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == SST)
5181  visc_numerics->SetTurbKineticEnergy(solver_container[TURB_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution(0), solver_container[TURB_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution(0));
5182 
5183 
5184  /*--- Gradient and limiter of Adjoint Variables ---*/
5185 
5186  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
5187 
5188  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
5189 
5190  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
5191 
5192  /*--- Update adjoint viscous residual ---*/
5193 
5194  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
5195 
5196  if (implicit)
5197  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
5198 
5199  }
5200  }
5201  }
5202 
5203  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
5204 
5205  delete [] Normal;
5206  delete [] Psi_domain; delete [] Psi_outlet;
5207 
5208 }
5209 
5210 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Engine_Inflow(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
5211 
5212  su2double *Normal, *V_domain, *V_inflow, *Psi_domain, *Psi_inflow, P_Fan, Velocity[3],
5213  Velocity2, Density, Vn, UnitNormal[3], Area, a1;
5214  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
5215  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
5216 
5217  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
5218  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
5219 
5220  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
5221  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar]; Psi_inflow = new su2double[nVar];
5222 
5223  /*--- Loop over all the vertices ---*/
5224 
5225  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
5226 
5227  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5228 
5229  /*--- If the node belong to the domain ---*/
5230 
5231  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
5232 
5233  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
5234 
5235  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
5236  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
5237  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
5238 
5239  Area = 0.0;
5240  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5241  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
5242  Area = sqrt (Area);
5243 
5244  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5245  UnitNormal[iDim] = Normal[iDim]/Area;
5246 
5247  /*--- Allocate the value at the inflow ---*/
5248 
5249  V_inflow = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
5250 
5251  /*--- Retrieve solution at the boundary node ---*/
5252 
5253  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
5254 
5255  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the boundary ---*/
5256 
5257  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
5258  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
5259 
5260  /*--- Subsonic flow is assumed, note that there is no non-dimensionalization. ---*/
5261 
5262  P_Fan = config->GetInflow_Pressure(Marker_Tag);
5263 
5264  Density = V_domain[nDim+2];
5265  Velocity2 = 0.0; Vn = 0.0;
5266  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5267  Velocity[iDim] = V_domain[iDim+1];
5268  Velocity2 += Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
5269  Vn += Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
5270  }
5271 
5272  /*---Subsonic Case(s) using Riemann invariants ---*/
5273 
5274  // Pressure = V_domain[nDim+1];
5275  // SoundSpeed = sqrt(Pressure*Gamma/Density);
5276  // Mach_Fan = sqrt(Velocity2)/SoundSpeed;
5277  // Entropy = Pressure*pow(1.0/Density, Gamma);
5278  // Riemann = Vn + 2.0*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One;
5279 
5280  // /*--- Compute (Vn - Ubn).n term for use in the BC.
5281  // Compute the new fictious state at the outlet ---*/
5282 
5283  // Density = pow(P_Fan/Entropy,1.0/Gamma);
5284  // SoundSpeed = sqrt(Gamma*P_Fan/Density);
5285  // Vn_Fan = Riemann - 2.0*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One;
5286  // Velocity2 = 0.0;
5287  // for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5288  // Velocity[iDim] = Velocity[iDim] + (Vn_Fan-Vn)*UnitNormal[iDim];
5289  // Velocity2 += Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
5290  // }
5291 
5292  /*--- Shorthand for repeated term in the boundary conditions ---*/
5293 
5294  a1 = sqrt(Gamma*P_Fan/Density)/(Gamma_Minus_One);
5295 
5296  /*--- Impose values for PsiRho & Phi using PsiE from domain. ---*/
5297 
5298  Psi_inflow[nVar-1] = Psi_domain[nVar-1];
5299  Psi_inflow[0] = 0.5*Psi_inflow[nVar-1]*Velocity2;
5300  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5301  Psi_inflow[0] += Psi_inflow[nVar-1]*a1*Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
5302  Psi_inflow[iDim+1] = -Psi_inflow[nVar-1]*(a1*UnitNormal[iDim] + Velocity[iDim]);
5303  }
5304 
5305  /*--- Set the flow and adjoint states in the solver ---*/
5306 
5307  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inflow);
5308  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_inflow);
5309 
5310  /*--- Compute the residual ---*/
5311 
5312  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij,
5313  Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
5314 
5315  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
5316 
5317  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
5318 
5319  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
5320 
5321  if (implicit)
5322  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
5323 
5324  }
5325  }
5326 
5327  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
5328 
5329  delete [] Normal;
5330  delete [] Psi_domain;
5331  delete [] Psi_inflow;
5332 
5333 }
5334 
5335 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Engine_Exhaust(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
5336 
5337  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
5338  su2double Area, *Normal, *V_domain, *V_exhaust, *Psi_domain, *Psi_exhaust;
5339  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
5340 
5341  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
5342  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
5343 
5344  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
5345  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar]; Psi_exhaust = new su2double[nVar];
5346 
5347  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
5348 
5349  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
5350  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5351 
5352  /*--- Check that the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
5353 
5354  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
5355 
5356  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
5357 
5358  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
5359  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
5360  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
5361 
5362  Area = 0.0;
5363  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5364  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
5365  Area = sqrt (Area);
5366 
5367  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
5368 
5369  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
5370 
5371  /*--- Allocate the value at the exhaust ---*/
5372 
5373  V_exhaust = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
5374 
5375  /*--- Retrieve solution at the boundary node ---*/
5376 
5377  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
5378 
5379  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the boundary ---*/
5380 
5381  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
5382  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
5383 
5384  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the exhaust (this should be improved using characteristics bc) ---*/
5385 
5386  Psi_exhaust[0] = 0.0;
5387  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5388  Psi_exhaust[iDim+1] = node[Point_Normal]->GetSolution(iDim+1);
5389  Psi_exhaust[nDim+1] = 0.0;
5390 
5391  /*--- Set the flow and adjoint states in the solver ---*/
5392 
5393  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_exhaust);
5394  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_exhaust);
5395 
5396  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
5397 
5398  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
5399 
5400  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
5401 
5402  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
5403 
5404  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
5405 
5406  if (implicit)
5407  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
5408 
5409  }
5410  }
5411 
5412  delete [] Normal;
5413  delete [] Psi_domain; delete [] Psi_exhaust;
5414 
5415 }
5416 
5417 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_ActDisk_Inlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
5418 
5419  su2double *Normal, *V_domain, *V_inlet, *Psi_domain, *Psi_inlet;
5420  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
5421  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, GlobalIndex_inlet, GlobalIndex;
5422 
5423  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
5424 
5425  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
5426  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar]; Psi_inlet = new su2double[nVar];
5427 
5428  /*--- Loop over all the vertices ---*/
5429 
5430  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
5431 
5432  GlobalIndex_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetDonorGlobalIndex(val_marker, iVertex);
5433 
5434  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5435  GlobalIndex = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
5436 
5437  /*--- If the node belong to the domain ---*/
5438 
5439  if ((geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) && (GlobalIndex != GlobalIndex_inlet)) {
5440 
5441  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
5442 
5443  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
5444  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
5445  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
5446 
5447  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
5448 
5449  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
5450 
5451  /*--- Retrieve solution at the boundary node ---*/
5452 
5453  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
5454 
5455  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the boundary ---*/
5456 
5457  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5458  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
5459  Psi_inlet[iVar] = 0.0;// node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
5460  }
5461 
5462 #ifdef CHECK
5463  su2double UnitNormal[3], Area=0.0;
5464 
5465  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5466  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
5467  Area = sqrt (Area);
5468 
5469  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5470  UnitNormal[iDim] = Normal[iDim]/Area;
5471 
5472  /*--- Subsonic flow is assumed, note that there is no non-dimensionalization. ---*/
5473 
5474  P_Fan = V_domain[nDim+1] ;
5475 
5476  Density = V_domain[nDim+2];
5477  Velocity2 = 0.0; Vn = 0.0;
5478  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5479  Velocity[iDim] = V_domain[iDim+1];
5480  Velocity2 += Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
5481  Vn += Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
5482  }
5483 
5484  /*---Subsonic Case(s) using Riemann invariants ---*/
5485 
5486  Pressure = V_domain[nDim+1];
5487  SoundSpeed = sqrt(Pressure*Gamma/Density);
5488 
5489  Entropy = Pressure*pow(1.0/Density, Gamma);
5490  Riemann = Vn + 2.0*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One;
5491 
5492  /*--- Compute (Vn - Ubn).n term for use in the BC.
5493  Compute the new fictious state at the outlet ---*/
5494 
5495  Density = pow(P_Fan/Entropy,1.0/Gamma);
5496  SoundSpeed = sqrt(Gamma*P_Fan/Density);
5497  Vn_Fan = Riemann - 2.0*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One;
5498 
5499  Velocity2 = 0.0;
5500  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5501  Velocity[iDim] = Velocity[iDim] + (Vn_Fan-Vn)*UnitNormal[iDim];
5502  Velocity2 += Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
5503  }
5504 
5505  /*--- Impose values for PsiRho & Phi using PsiE from domain. ---*/
5506 
5507  Psi_inlet[nVar-1] = Psi_domain[nVar-1];
5508 
5509  a1 = SoundSpeed*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One/Vn;
5510 
5511  Psi_inlet[0] = Psi_inlet[nVar-1]*(Velocity2*0.5+Vn_Fan*a1);
5512  Psi_inlet[iDim+1] = 0.0;
5513  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5514  Psi_inlet[iDim+1] += -Psi_inlet[nVar-1]*(a1*UnitNormal[iDim] + Velocity[iDim]);
5515  }
5516 
5517 #endif
5518 
5519  /*--- Set the flow and adjoint states in the solver ---*/
5520 
5521  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
5522  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_inlet);
5523 
5524  /*--- Compute the residual ---*/
5525 
5526  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij,
5527  Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
5528 
5529  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
5530 
5531  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
5532 
5533  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
5534 
5535  if (implicit)
5536  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
5537 
5538  }
5539  }
5540 
5541  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
5542 
5543  delete [] Normal;
5544  delete [] Psi_domain;
5545  delete [] Psi_inlet;
5546 
5547 }
5548 
5549 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_ActDisk_Outlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
5550 
5551  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, GlobalIndex_inlet, GlobalIndex;
5552  su2double *Normal, *V_domain, *V_outlet, *Psi_domain, *Psi_outlet;
5553  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
5554 
5555  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
5556 
5557  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
5558  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar];
5559  Psi_outlet = new su2double[nVar];
5560 
5561  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
5562 
5563  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
5564 
5565  GlobalIndex_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetDonorGlobalIndex(val_marker, iVertex);
5566 
5567  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
5568  GlobalIndex = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
5569 
5570  /*--- Check that the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) and to discard the perimeter ---*/
5571 
5572  if ((geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) && (GlobalIndex != GlobalIndex_inlet)) {
5573 
5574  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
5575 
5576  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
5577  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
5578  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
5579 
5580  /*--- Allocate the value at the outlet ---*/
5581 
5582  V_outlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
5583 
5584  /*--- Retrieve solution at the boundary node ---*/
5585 
5586  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
5587 
5588  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the boundary ---*/
5589 
5590  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5591  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
5592  Psi_outlet[iVar] = 0.0; //node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
5593  }
5594 
5595 #ifdef CHECK
5596  unsigned long Point_Normal;
5597  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
5598 
5599  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
5600 
5601  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the outlet (this should be improved using characteristics bc) ---*/
5602 
5603  Psi_outlet[0] = 0.0;
5604  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5605  Psi_outlet[iDim+1] = node[Point_Normal]->GetSolution(iDim+1);
5606  Psi_outlet[nDim+1] = 0.0;
5607 
5608 #endif
5609 
5610  /*--- Set the flow and adjoint states in the solver ---*/
5611 
5612  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
5613  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_outlet);
5614 
5615  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
5616 
5617  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
5618 
5619  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
5620 
5621  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
5622 
5623  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
5624 
5625  if (implicit)
5626  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
5627 
5628  }
5629 
5630  }
5631 
5632  delete [] Normal;
5633  delete [] Psi_domain;
5634  delete [] Psi_outlet;
5635 
5636 }
5637 
5638 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_ActDisk(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics,
5639  CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker, bool val_inlet_surface) {
5640 
5641 }
5642 
5643 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetResidual_DualTime(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned short iRKStep,
5644  unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short RunTime_EqSystem) {
5645  unsigned short iVar, jVar;
5646  unsigned long iPoint;
5647  su2double *U_time_nM1, *U_time_n, *U_time_nP1, Volume_nM1, Volume_n, Volume_nP1, TimeStep;
5648 
5649  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
5650  bool Grid_Movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
5651 
5652  /*--- loop over points ---*/
5653  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
5654 
5655  /*--- Solution at time n-1, n and n+1 ---*/
5656  U_time_nM1 = node[iPoint]->GetSolution_time_n1();
5657  U_time_n = node[iPoint]->GetSolution_time_n();
5658  U_time_nP1 = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
5659 
5660  /*--- Volume at time n-1 and n ---*/
5661  if (Grid_Movement) {
5662  Volume_nM1 = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume_nM1();
5663  Volume_n = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume_n();
5664  Volume_nP1 = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
5665  }
5666  else {
5667  Volume_nM1 = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
5668  Volume_n = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
5669  Volume_nP1 = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
5670  }
5671 
5672  /*--- Time Step ---*/
5673  TimeStep = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
5674 
5675  /*--- Compute Residual ---*/
5676  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5677  if (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_1ST)
5678  Residual[iVar] = ( U_time_nP1[iVar]*Volume_nP1 - U_time_n[iVar]*Volume_n ) / TimeStep;
5679  if (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_2ND)
5680  Residual[iVar] = ( 3.0*U_time_nP1[iVar]*Volume_nP1 - 4.0*U_time_n[iVar]*Volume_n
5681  + 1.0*U_time_nM1[iVar]*Volume_nM1 ) / (2.0*TimeStep);
5682  }
5683 
5684  /*--- Add Residual ---*/
5685  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
5686 
5687  if (implicit) {
5688  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5689  for (jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar++)
5690  Jacobian_i[iVar][jVar] = 0.0;
5691 
5692  if (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_1ST)
5693  Jacobian_i[iVar][iVar] = Volume_nP1 / TimeStep;
5694  if (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_2ND)
5695  Jacobian_i[iVar][iVar] = (Volume_nP1*3.0)/(2.0*TimeStep);
5696  }
5697  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
5698  }
5699  }
5700 
5701 }
5702 
5703 void CAdjEulerSolver::LoadRestart(CGeometry **geometry, CSolver ***solver, CConfig *config, int val_iter, bool val_update_geo) {
5704 
5705  /*--- Restart the solution from file information ---*/
5706  unsigned short iDim, iVar, iMesh;
5707  unsigned long iPoint, index, iChildren, Point_Fine;
5708  su2double Area_Children, Area_Parent, *Coord, *Solution_Fine;
5709  bool dual_time = ((config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_1ST) ||
5710  (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_2ND));
5711  bool time_stepping = config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == TIME_STEPPING;
5712  string UnstExt, text_line, filename, restart_filename;
5713  ifstream restart_file;
5714 
5715  unsigned short iZone = config->GetiZone();
5716  unsigned short nZone = config->GetnZone();
5717 
5718  /*--- Restart the solution from file information ---*/
5719 
5720  filename = config->GetSolution_AdjFileName();
5721  restart_filename = config->GetObjFunc_Extension(filename);
5722 
5723  Coord = new su2double [nDim];
5724  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5725  Coord[iDim] = 0.0;
5726 
5727  /*--- Skip coordinates ---*/
5728 
5729  unsigned short skipVars = geometry[MESH_0]->GetnDim();
5730 
5731  /*--- Multizone problems require the number of the zone to be appended. ---*/
5732 
5733  if (nZone > 1)
5734  restart_filename = config->GetMultizone_FileName(restart_filename, iZone);
5735 
5736  /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
5737 
5738  if (dual_time || time_stepping)
5739  restart_filename = config->GetUnsteady_FileName(restart_filename, val_iter);
5740 
5741  /*--- Read the restart data from either an ASCII or binary SU2 file. ---*/
5742 
5743  if (config->GetRead_Binary_Restart()) {
5744  Read_SU2_Restart_Binary(geometry[MESH_0], config, restart_filename);
5745  } else {
5746  Read_SU2_Restart_ASCII(geometry[MESH_0], config, restart_filename);
5747  }
5748 
5749  /*--- Load data from the restart into correct containers. ---*/
5750 
5751  int counter = 0;
5752  long iPoint_Local = 0; unsigned long iPoint_Global = 0;
5753  unsigned long iPoint_Global_Local = 0;
5754  unsigned short rbuf_NotMatching = 0, sbuf_NotMatching = 0;
5755 
5756  for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry[MESH_0]->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
5757 
5758  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
5759  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
5760 
5761  iPoint_Local = geometry[MESH_0]->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
5762 
5763  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
5764 
5765  /*--- We need to store this point's data, so jump to the correct
5766  offset in the buffer of data from the restart file and load it. ---*/
5767 
5768  index = counter*Restart_Vars[1] + skipVars;
5769  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution[iVar] = Restart_Data[index+iVar];
5770 
5771  node[iPoint_Local]->SetSolution(Solution);
5772  iPoint_Global_Local++;
5773 
5774  /*--- Increment the overall counter for how many points have been loaded. ---*/
5775  counter++;
5776  }
5777  }
5778 
5779  /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
5780 
5781  if (iPoint_Global_Local < nPointDomain) { sbuf_NotMatching = 1; }
5782 
5783 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
5784  rbuf_NotMatching = sbuf_NotMatching;
5785 #else
5786  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&sbuf_NotMatching, &rbuf_NotMatching, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
5787 #endif
5788  if (rbuf_NotMatching != 0) {
5789  SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
5790  string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
5791  }
5792 
5793  /*--- Communicate the loaded solution on the fine grid before we transfer
5794  it down to the coarse levels. We also call the preprocessing routine
5795  on the fine level in order to have all necessary quantities updated. ---*/
5796 
5797  solver[MESH_0][ADJFLOW_SOL]->Set_MPI_Solution(geometry[MESH_0], config);
5798  solver[MESH_0][ADJFLOW_SOL]->Preprocessing(geometry[MESH_0], solver[MESH_0], config, MESH_0, NO_RK_ITER, RUNTIME_FLOW_SYS, false);
5799 
5800  /*--- Interpolate the solution down to the coarse multigrid levels ---*/
5801 
5802  for (iMesh = 1; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
5803  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry[iMesh]->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
5804  Area_Parent = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
5805  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution[iVar] = 0.0;
5806  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++) {
5807  Point_Fine = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
5808  Area_Children = geometry[iMesh-1]->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
5809  Solution_Fine = solver[iMesh-1][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[Point_Fine]->GetSolution();
5810  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5811  Solution[iVar] += Solution_Fine[iVar]*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
5812  }
5813  }
5814  solver[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->SetSolution(Solution);
5815  }
5816  solver[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->Set_MPI_Solution(geometry[iMesh], config);
5817  solver[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->Preprocessing(geometry[iMesh], solver[iMesh], config, iMesh, NO_RK_ITER, RUNTIME_FLOW_SYS, false);
5818  }
5819 
5820  delete [] Coord;
5821 
5822  /*--- Delete the class memory that is used to load the restart. ---*/
5823 
5824  if (Restart_Vars != NULL) delete [] Restart_Vars;
5825  if (Restart_Data != NULL) delete [] Restart_Data;
5826  Restart_Vars = NULL; Restart_Data = NULL;
5827 
5828 }
5829 
5830 CAdjNSSolver::CAdjNSSolver(void) : CAdjEulerSolver() { }
5831 
5832 CAdjNSSolver::CAdjNSSolver(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) : CAdjEulerSolver() {
5833  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
5834  string text_line, mesh_filename;
5835  unsigned short iDim, iVar, iMarker, nLineLets;
5836  ifstream restart_file;
5837  string filename, AdjExt;
5838 
5839  su2double RefArea = config->GetRefArea();
5840  su2double RefDensity = config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
5841  su2double Gas_Constant = config->GetGas_ConstantND();
5842  su2double Mach_Motion = config->GetMach_Motion();
5843  su2double Area=0.0, *Normal = NULL, myArea_Monitored;
5844  su2double RefVel2, Mach2Vel, Weight_ObjFunc, factor;
5845  su2double *Velocity_Inf;
5846 
5847  string Marker_Tag, Monitoring_Tag;
5848  unsigned short iMarker_Monitoring, jMarker, ObjFunc;
5849  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
5850  bool restart = config->GetRestart();
5851 
5852  /*--- Norm heat flux objective test ---*/
5853  pnorm = 1.0;
5854  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==MAXIMUM_HEATFLUX)
5855  pnorm = 8.0; // Matches MaxNorm defined in solver_direct_mean.
5856 
5857  /*--- Set the gamma value ---*/
5858 
5859  Gamma = config->GetGamma();
5860  Gamma_Minus_One = Gamma - 1.0;
5861 
5862  /*--- Define geometry constants in the solver structure ---*/
5863 
5864  nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
5865  nMarker = config->GetnMarker_All();
5866  nPoint = geometry->GetnPoint();
5867  nPointDomain = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
5868 
5869  nVar = nDim + 2;
5870 
5871  /*--- Initialize nVarGrad for deallocation ---*/
5872 
5873  nVarGrad = nVar;
5874 
5875  node = new CVariable*[nPoint];
5876 
5877  /*--- Define some auxiliary arrays related to the residual ---*/
5878 
5879  Point_Max = new unsigned long[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Point_Max[iVar] = 0;
5880  Point_Max_Coord = new su2double*[nVar];
5881  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5882  Point_Max_Coord[iVar] = new su2double[nDim];
5883  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Point_Max_Coord[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
5884  }
5885  Residual = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual[iVar] = 0.0;
5886  Residual_RMS = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_RMS[iVar] = 0.0;
5887  Residual_Max = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_Max[iVar] = 0.0;
5888  Residual_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_i[iVar] = 0.0;
5889  Residual_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_j[iVar] = 0.0;
5890  Res_Conv_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Conv_i[iVar] = 0.0;
5891  Res_Visc_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Visc_i[iVar] = 0.0;
5892  Res_Conv_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Conv_j[iVar] = 0.0;
5893  Res_Visc_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Visc_j[iVar] = 0.0;
5894 
5895  /*--- Define some auxiliary arrays related to the solution ---*/
5896 
5897  Solution = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution[iVar] = 0.0;
5898  Solution_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution_i[iVar] = 0.0;
5899  Solution_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution_j[iVar] = 0.0;
5900 
5901  /*--- Define some auxiliary arrays related to the flow solution ---*/
5902 
5903  FlowPrimVar_i = new su2double[nDim+7]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim+7; iVar++) FlowPrimVar_i[iVar] = 0.0;
5904  FlowPrimVar_j = new su2double[nDim+7]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim+7; iVar++) FlowPrimVar_j[iVar] = 0.0;
5905 
5906  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the geometry ---*/
5907 
5908  Vector = new su2double[nDim]; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector[iDim] = 0.0;
5909  Vector_i = new su2double[nDim]; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector_i[iDim] = 0.0;
5910  Vector_j = new su2double[nDim]; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector_j[iDim] = 0.0;
5911 
5912  /*--- Point to point Jacobians. These are always defined because
5913  they are also used for sensitivity calculations. ---*/
5914 
5915  Jacobian_i = new su2double* [nVar];
5916  Jacobian_j = new su2double* [nVar];
5917  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5918  Jacobian_i[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
5919  Jacobian_j[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
5920  }
5921 
5922  /*--- Solution and residual vectors ---*/
5923 
5924  LinSysSol.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
5925  LinSysRes.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
5926 
5927  /*--- Jacobians and vector structures for implicit computations ---*/
5928 
5929  if (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT) {
5930  Jacobian_ii = new su2double*[nVar];
5931  Jacobian_ij = new su2double*[nVar];
5932  Jacobian_ji = new su2double*[nVar];
5933  Jacobian_jj = new su2double*[nVar];
5934  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5935  Jacobian_ii[iVar] = new su2double[nVar];
5936  Jacobian_ij[iVar] = new su2double[nVar];
5937  Jacobian_ji[iVar] = new su2double[nVar];
5938  Jacobian_jj[iVar] = new su2double[nVar];
5939  }
5940  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
5941  cout << "Initialize Jacobian structure (Adjoint N-S). MG level: " << iMesh <<"." << endl;
5942  Jacobian.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, nVar, true, geometry, config);
5943 
5944  if ((config->GetKind_Linear_Solver_Prec() == LINELET) ||
5945  (config->GetKind_Linear_Solver() == SMOOTHER_LINELET)) {
5946  nLineLets = Jacobian.BuildLineletPreconditioner(geometry, config);
5947  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Compute linelet structure. " << nLineLets << " elements in each line (average)." << endl;
5948  }
5949 
5950  } else {
5951  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
5952  cout << "Explicit scheme. No Jacobian structure (Adjoint N-S). MG level: " << iMesh <<"." << endl;
5953  }
5954 
5955  /*--- Array structures for computation of gradients by least squares ---*/
5956  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) {
5957  /*--- S matrix := inv(R)*traspose(inv(R)) ---*/
5958  Smatrix = new su2double* [nDim];
5959  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5960  Smatrix[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
5961  /*--- c vector := transpose(WA)*(Wb) ---*/
5962  Cvector = new su2double* [nVar];
5963  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
5964  Cvector[iVar] = new su2double [nDim];
5965  }
5966 
5967  /*--- Sensitivity definition and coefficient on all markers ---*/
5968  CSensitivity = new su2double* [nMarker];
5969  for (iMarker=0; iMarker<nMarker; iMarker++) {
5970  CSensitivity[iMarker] = new su2double [geometry->nVertex[iMarker]];
5971  }
5972 
5973  /*--- Store the value of the characteristic primitive variables at the boundaries ---*/
5974 
5975  DonorAdjVar = new su2double** [nMarker];
5976  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5977  DonorAdjVar[iMarker] = new su2double* [geometry->nVertex[iMarker]];
5978  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5979  DonorAdjVar[iMarker][iVertex] = new su2double [nVar];
5980  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
5981  DonorAdjVar[iMarker][iVertex][iVar] = 0.0;
5982  }
5983  }
5984  }
5985 
5986  /*--- Store the value of the characteristic primitive variables at the boundaries ---*/
5987 
5988  DonorGlobalIndex = new unsigned long* [nMarker];
5989  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
5990  DonorGlobalIndex[iMarker] = new unsigned long [geometry->nVertex[iMarker]];
5991  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
5992  DonorGlobalIndex[iMarker][iVertex] = 0;
5993  }
5994  }
5995 
5996  Sens_Geo = new su2double[nMarker];
5997  Sens_Mach = new su2double[nMarker];
5998  Sens_AoA = new su2double[nMarker];
5999  Sens_Press = new su2double[nMarker];
6000  Sens_Temp = new su2double[nMarker];
6001  Sens_BPress = new su2double[nMarker];
6002 
6003  /*--- Initialize sensitivities to zero ---*/
6004  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
6005  Sens_Geo[iMarker] = 0.0;
6006  Sens_Mach[iMarker] = 0.0;
6007  Sens_AoA[iMarker] = 0.0;
6008  Sens_Press[iMarker] = 0.0;
6009  Sens_Temp[iMarker] = 0.0;
6010  Sens_BPress[iMarker] = 0.0;
6011  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++)
6012  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = 0.0;
6013  }
6014 
6015  /*--- Initialize the adjoint variables to zero (infinity state) ---*/
6016  PsiRho_Inf = 0.0;
6017  if ((config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == TOTAL_HEATFLUX) ||
6018  (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MAXIMUM_HEATFLUX) ||
6019  (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == INVERSE_DESIGN_HEATFLUX))
6020  PsiE_Inf = 1.0;
6021  else
6022  PsiE_Inf = 0.0;
6023  Phi_Inf = new su2double [nDim];
6024  Phi_Inf[0] = 0.0; Phi_Inf[1] = 0.0;
6025  if (nDim == 3) Phi_Inf[2] = 0.0;
6026 
6027  /*--- Initialize the solution to the far-field state everywhere. ---*/
6028 
6029  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
6030  node[iPoint] = new CAdjNSVariable(PsiRho_Inf, Phi_Inf, PsiE_Inf, nDim, nVar, config);
6031 
6032  /*--- Read the restart metadata. ---*/
6033 
6034  if (restart && (iMesh == MESH_0)) {
6035  mesh_filename = config->GetSolution_AdjFileName();
6036  filename = config->GetObjFunc_Extension(mesh_filename);
6037  Read_SU2_Restart_Metadata(geometry, config, true, filename);
6038  }
6039 
6040  /*--- Calculate area monitored for area-averaged-outflow-quantity-based objectives ---*/
6041  myArea_Monitored = 0.0;
6042  for (iMarker_Monitoring = 0; iMarker_Monitoring < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); iMarker_Monitoring++) {
6043  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring)==SURFACE_TOTAL_PRESSURE ||
6044  config->GetKind_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring)==SURFACE_STATIC_PRESSURE) {
6045 
6046  Monitoring_Tag = config->GetMarker_Monitoring_TagBound(iMarker_Monitoring);
6047  /*-- Find the marker index ---*/
6048  iMarker = 0;
6049  for (jMarker= 0; jMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); jMarker++) {
6050  Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(jMarker);
6051  if (Marker_Tag == Monitoring_Tag) {
6052  iMarker = jMarker;
6053  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
6054  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
6055  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
6056  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
6057  Area = 0.0;
6058  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6059  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
6060  myArea_Monitored += sqrt (Area);
6061  }
6062  }
6063  break;
6064  }
6065  }
6066  }
6067  }
6068 
6069 
6070  #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6071  Area_Monitored = 0.0;
6072  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&myArea_Monitored, &Area_Monitored, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6073  #else
6074  Area_Monitored = myArea_Monitored;
6075  #endif
6076 
6077  if (config->GetnObj() > 1 && iMesh == MESH_0) {
6078  if (grid_movement) {
6079  Mach2Vel = sqrt(Gamma*Gas_Constant*config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND());
6080  RefVel2 = (Mach_Motion*Mach2Vel)*(Mach_Motion*Mach2Vel);
6081  }
6082  else {
6083  Velocity_Inf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
6084  RefVel2 = 0.0;
6085  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6086  RefVel2 += Velocity_Inf[iDim]*Velocity_Inf[iDim];
6087  }
6088 
6089  /*--- Objective scaling: a factor must be applied to certain objectives ---*/
6090  for (iMarker_Monitoring = 0; iMarker_Monitoring < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); iMarker_Monitoring++) {
6091  Weight_ObjFunc = config->GetWeight_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring);
6092 
6093  factor = 1.0/(0.5*RefDensity*RefArea*RefVel2);
6094 
6095  ObjFunc = config->GetKind_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring);
6096  if ((ObjFunc == INVERSE_DESIGN_HEATFLUX) ||
6097  (ObjFunc == TOTAL_HEATFLUX) || (ObjFunc == MAXIMUM_HEATFLUX) ||
6098  (ObjFunc == SURFACE_MASSFLOW) ) factor = 1.0;
6099 
6100  if ((ObjFunc == SURFACE_TOTAL_PRESSURE) || (ObjFunc == SURFACE_STATIC_PRESSURE))
6101  factor = 1.0/Area_Monitored;
6102 
6103  Weight_ObjFunc = Weight_ObjFunc*factor;
6104  config->SetWeight_ObjFunc(iMarker_Monitoring, Weight_ObjFunc);
6105 
6106  }
6107  }
6108 
6109  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
6110  Set_MPI_Solution(geometry, config);
6111 
6112 }
6113 
6114 CAdjNSSolver::~CAdjNSSolver(void) {
6115 
6116 }
6117 
6118 
6119 void CAdjNSSolver::SetTime_Step(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config,
6120  unsigned short iMesh, unsigned long Iteration) {
6121 
6122  /*--- Use the flow solution to update the time step
6123  * The time step depends on the characteristic velocity, which is the same
6124  * for the adjoint and flow solutions, albeit in the opposite direction. ---*/
6125  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->SetTime_Step(geometry, solver_container, config, iMesh, Iteration);
6126 
6127 }
6128 
6129 void CAdjNSSolver::Preprocessing(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short iRKStep, unsigned short RunTime_EqSystem, bool Output) {
6130 
6131  unsigned long iPoint, ErrorCounter = 0;
6132  su2double SharpEdge_Distance;
6133  bool RightSol = true;
6134 
6135  /*--- Retrieve information about the spatial and temporal integration for the
6136  adjoint equations (note that the flow problem may use different methods). ---*/
6137 
6138  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
6139  bool limiter = (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_AdjFlow() != NO_LIMITER);
6140  bool center_jst = (config->GetKind_Centered_AdjFlow() == JST);
6141  bool fixed_cl = config->GetFixed_CL_Mode();
6142  bool eval_dof_dcx = config->GetEval_dOF_dCX();
6143 
6144  /*--- Update the objective function coefficient to guarantee zero gradient. ---*/
6145 
6146  if (fixed_cl && eval_dof_dcx) { SetFarfield_AoA(geometry, solver_container, config, iMesh, Output); }
6147 
6148  /*--- Residual initialization ---*/
6149 
6150  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint ++) {
6151 
6152  /*--- Get the distance form a sharp edge ---*/
6153 
6154  SharpEdge_Distance = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance();
6155 
6156  /*--- Initialize the non-physical points vector ---*/
6157 
6158  node[iPoint]->SetNon_Physical(false);
6159 
6160  /*--- Set the primitive variables compressible
6161  adjoint variables ---*/
6162 
6163  RightSol = node[iPoint]->SetPrimVar(SharpEdge_Distance, false, config);
6164  if (!RightSol) { node[iPoint]->SetNon_Physical(true); ErrorCounter++; }
6165 
6166  /*--- Initialize the convective residual vector ---*/
6167 
6168  if (!Output) LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint);
6169 
6170  }
6171 
6172  /*--- Compute gradients adj for solution reconstruction and viscous term ---*/
6173 
6174  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == GREEN_GAUSS) SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config);
6175  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config);
6176 
6177  /*--- Limiter computation (upwind reconstruction) ---*/
6178 
6179  if (limiter && !Output) SetSolution_Limiter(geometry, config);
6180 
6181  /*--- Compute gradients adj for viscous term coupling ---*/
6182 
6183  if ((config->GetKind_Solver() == ADJ_RANS) && (!config->GetFrozen_Visc_Cont())) {
6184  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == GREEN_GAUSS) solver_container[ADJTURB_SOL]->SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config);
6185  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) solver_container[ADJTURB_SOL]->SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config);
6186  }
6187 
6188  /*--- Artificial dissipation for centered schemes ---*/
6189 
6190  if (center_jst && (iMesh == MESH_0)) {
6191  SetCentered_Dissipation_Sensor(geometry, config);
6192  SetUndivided_Laplacian(geometry, config);
6193  }
6194 
6195  /*--- Initialize the Jacobian for implicit integration ---*/
6196 
6197  if (implicit) Jacobian.SetValZero();
6198 
6199  /*--- Error message ---*/
6200 
6201  if (config->GetConsole_Output_Verb() == VERB_HIGH) {
6202 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6203  unsigned long MyErrorCounter = ErrorCounter; ErrorCounter = 0;
6204  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyErrorCounter, &ErrorCounter, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6205 #endif
6206  if (iMesh == MESH_0) config->SetNonphysical_Points(ErrorCounter);
6207  }
6208 
6209 }
6210 
6211 void CAdjNSSolver::Viscous_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
6212  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short iRKStep) {
6213  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iEdge;
6214 
6215  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
6216 
6217  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
6218 
6219  /*--- Points in edge, coordinates and normal vector---*/
6220 
6221  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
6222  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
6223 
6224  numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord());
6225  numerics->SetNormal(geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal());
6226 
6227  /*--- Primitive variables w/o reconstruction and adjoint variables w/o reconstruction---*/
6228 
6229  numerics->SetPrimitive(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive(),
